name: Ascendance
description: Ascendance is an upcoming space strategy game in which the player takes control of a civilisation taking its first steps into into space. It features a massive game world, a deep simulation of civilisations, and real-time strategy space battles.

name: Seagull Kart Racing
description: A frenetic and fun racing game across space and time where you must dive and fly to be the first seagull to cross the finish line!

name: Summoner Arise!
description: Turn-based. Tactics. Roguelike. Summon units and battle your way past wave after wave of enemies. Start with a fixed amount of mana as you ascend a mysterious ruined temple. Run out and you lose. With hundreds of upgrades available, customize and command your army to victory!

name: Feluna Base
description: A tiny base builder roguelite where the only enemy is time. Provide food and shelter for your growing outpost. Produce advanced resources for your home station. Discover the mysteries of Feluna with every new run.

name: Punchimals
description: Puchimals is a physics-based 2.5D fighting game set in a world where cute, chubby animals settle their differences by duking it out in giant mechs. Due to a lack of exercise (certainly not caused by overuse of mechs in everyday life), obesity and mech combat has ravaged the globe!

name: Katuba's Poacher
description: ''Wanted!!'' Chatch the Adoarble 'Sharp' for Reward! "Katuba's Poacher" is Boss-Battle action game with a cartoon and animation style.

name: Once Upon a Tile
description: Once Upon a Tile is a strategic dungeon-builder, where you don't control the hero! Instead, you cleverly place dungeon tiles to guide your hero to victory - or to their demise, if you are careless. You will need to be tricky and clever in this dungeon-building puzzle game!

name: VR Rescue Girls: Moe
description: Find the girl figures hidden in the room! Have xxx with the girl whose figure you find!

name: Slide Ball Master
description: Slide Ball Master is a new puzzle game with unique gameplay where you shoot bricks with your slingshot. With Carom's billiard-like gameplay, it's very important to calculate your shot.

name: Wrenched
description: Wrenched is a 3d bullet hell platformer where you dodge bullets and destroy robots with a giant sword! Explore a post-apocalyptic wasteland, meet its survivors, hijack vehicles and platform your way through dangerous areas! All to get parts from the guts of giant killer robots!

name: Good Luck My Lord
description: Good Luck My Lord is a deckbuilding game where, as a feudal lord, your goal is to collect various resources to contribute to the King. Collect resources each week and submit resources each quarter. Try using different items, upgrading your fief, or obtaining special items to earn more resources!

name: Archipelagates
description: Archipelagates is an adult fantasy hack slash and loot game. Create your character and search dangerous islands for resources, weapons, and armor. Forge relationships with other inhabitants, friendly or romantic.

name: Thrust Master Deluxe
description: Thrust Master Deluxe is a Rocket-Powered Co-op Combat game where Pilots and Gunners out-maneuver and gun down the competition. Become the most lethal Pilot, the most ruthless Gunner. Become Deluxe.

name: Invasion Eternity
description: Embark on an epic ninja adventure in a world filled with thrilling quests, powerful champions, and strategic multiplayer battles! Assemble your team of elite warriors, conquer bases, and reap passive rewards to strengthen your champions. Dominate the battlefield!

name: The T.O.T.E.: Tales of the Elements
description: Save the world from the bad music of the Evil Music Industry in this cooperative 2D Hip Hop action RPG!

name: Panzerfaust
description: An authentic, single and multiplayer armored combat simulation set in WW2 featuring numerous vehicles, infantry and support assets.

name: Amazing Space
description: Welcome to the world of space stations! Create your own space base with workplaces and production facilities. Ensure sustainability and safety, explore space, defend your base, and build diplomatic relationships. Be vigilant and successful!

name: InterSpace
description: A portal-like puzzle game with stealth combat and unique missions for each level. It is the perfect combination of puzzle and FPS, with stunning graphic and great storyline to back it up.

name: Myriad Mayhem
description: Myriad Mayhem is a challenging horde survival game where you create builds with abilities with excluding talents in talent-trees, to survive and protect your peoples castle from a myriad of monsters, before they overwhelm you.

name: Achievement Display Cabinet
description: Achievement Display Cabinet is a casual game with 3 built-in mini games.You can earn Steam achievements by completing game tasks and decorate your Steam personal homepage with these achievements.

name: Empire Origin: Rise
description: The grand strategy game "Empire Origin: Rise" is coming. Explore the traces left by human civilization on the earth, pursue the great achievements of the kings in the historical fragments, and revive the brilliant civilization in history. glory? territory? Waiting for you to dominate the world!

name: Frogs Also Struggle
description: Platformer with simple jumping mechanics, you will know why frogs also struggle.

name: The Last King
description: In The Last King, a strategy action RPG, customize your character, craft weapons, build your base, and defend against Persian invaders. Lead your army into real-time battles, commanding and fighting alongside your troops in a strategic war game. Experience an epic journey of conquest and survival.

name: The Siege of Jeomdo
description: In this narrative-driven RPG, play as Dujom, a retired war veteran compelled to lead Jeomdo Village amidst dire circumstances. Make critical decisions, manage resources, and defend against overwhelming odds.

name: Evil Castle & Princess
description: "Evil Castle & Princess" is a game similar to Metroid Castlevania, mainly a horizontal action game based on exploration and combat. Wear your favorite weapons to explore the mysterious and dangerous relic castle! Destroy all the monsters that block you and find the secrets of the magic castle.

name: How!?
description: Dive into How!? - a thrilling cooperative game. Two adventurers discover a pyramid hiding a coveted artifact. Puzzles, traps, and cooperation await. Will they make it out alive?

name: Paris Transylvania
description: A turn-based vampire-slaying Pachinko Roguelike Deckbuilder mayhem! Collect a powerful deck of cards, strategize, aim, and pop pegs to power up and deal massive damage with relic synergies. Play as Marie Antoinette, explore and conquer Transylvania, defeating mighty vampire clans and hordes of evil.

name: Root Of Win
description: Root of Win is a 3D puzzle game where you solve levels with a friend or stranger in a co-op or alone.

name: Fallen Angel: Hell Survival
description: An Open World Sandbox First Person Survival Game set in Hell.

name: Chronicles of the Wolf
description: Step into the boots of Mateo Lombardo, an apprentice of the Rose Cross Order who finds himself the sole survivor of a viscous attack. The next chapter in the Migami Monsterverse growls through the trees. Are you brave enough to face it?

name: Amant
description: Amant is a Sokoban 3D puzzle game where you play as two magnets navigating through tile-based levels to uncover the secrets of an underground facility. See the other side of the level with a flexible camera and solve magnetic puzzle.

name: About Cannons & Sparrows
description: Prepare yourself for a visually stunning Metroidvania adventure that delivers a cinematic look and an engaging storytelling experience. Embark on a thrilling journey as a small cannon who hatches from a bird's egg, unaware of its true potential.

name: Infinitum: The Backrooms Story
description: Infinitum is a horror open-world survival co-op story game that can be played with up to 4 players. Adventure through the endless procedurally generated levels and discover the multiple endings of the game, every playthrough being different than the last.

name: Sparky Marky: Episode 3
description: Bad guys often bully classmates. That's the truth. But more often they bully you if you're new, and especially if you are a foreigner. But Toby faces a difficult task - to resist not only bullies, but also a hungry monster...

name: Bloom Runner
description: In a world fueled by passion, your speed spells seduction. Perform gravity-defying stunts in fast-paced runs to win over beautiful maidens in Bloom Runner. Breathless rewards await you!

name: Nimbit Frontier
description: Nimbit Frontier is a relaxing, futuristic life sim in which you build creature habitats for sale. You'll encounter wild Nimbits, hatch their young, cultivate exotic crops, and delve into the mine as part of your journey. Adapt your establishment to the changing seasons in the seaside community.

name: Lost In Winter
description: Get Lost in Winter's atmospheric beauty as a majestic lone wolf, exploring a snow-covered world on a spiritual journey. Uncover secrets, embrace the solitude, and let the enchantment of the winterland captivate you.

name: Haunted Station
description: Investigate cosmic mysteries in this immersive sci-fi horror-lite game. Face the challenge alone, or gather a team of investigators with online cooperative multiplayer. Survive your mission, and return with answers. Good luck, and watch your back.

name: Chimera's Mansion
description: This game is an FPS perspective 3D escape horror game. Use various items to solve the mystery and escape from the terrifying creatures Let's escape from the strange mansion

name: Bl0w-Up
description: Boomer shooter about a robot obliterating aliens.

name: Maid In Wonderland
description: Your fate, your duty, your - - - - - - - / - - - -.

name: Clay Monkey: The Master Potter and The Kiln God
description: Clay Monkey is a top-down exploration game based on sourcing materials from the earth to make ceramic art that will be displayed in a final art exhibition. With a dream, not just a monkey; an artist.

name: Loopush
description: Unleash intriguing reactions in the fusion of Sokoban and time loops in "Loopush". As a rabbit delivery worker, cooperate with your shadow friend to complete orders within limited steps. Solve puzzles with wit, fulfilling the rabbit's dream on a surprising and creative journey!

name: Tank Strike
description: Blast your way through countless leagues of enemies in this intense top-down shooter.

name: Clash
description: Unleash your inner beast in Clash, an action-packed open-world RPG. Harness enemy powers, upgrade weapons and skills, and dive into fast-paced gameplay. Shape the future and conquer challenges in this thrilling adventure in the atmospheric world, of Feralia Terra.

name: Astral Horizon
description: Astral Horizon is a first-person space opera adventure featuring combat with six degrees of freedom. Give orders to your squadmates and find creative ways to approach combat in zero-gravity. Explore epic sci-fi locations as you fight a war to uncover a perspective-shattering discovery.

name: Simil
description: Calm and stimulating puzzle. Connect colors, clear your mind, and unleash your creativity. Over 50 levels increasing in difficulty await you in this colorful journey.

name: Quarantine Town
description: Survive against relentless zombie hordes in an immersive post-apocalyptic world. Battle through waves, explore treacherous environments, and make split-second decisions to stay alive. Can you endure the nightmare and outlast the undead? It's a test of strategy, skill, and nerves.

name: Primal Earth
description: Open World Animal Survival Game Work together to increase your odds while bringing up the next generation. Explore, interact, and hone your skills to develop your character and become even stronger.

name: High Strategy: Oradros
description: High Strategy: Oradros is a distilled grand strategy game set in an original, low-fantasy world of hoplites and dinosaurs. There is no micromanagement, only decisions. All 40 playable realms have distinct starting conditions and goals.

name: Crimson Spirit
description: Your forest is corrupted, and you are the only one left to save it! Gather the remaining power of the forest and bring it back to the elder tree to revive it!

name: Bite Size Terrors: Speechless
description: Find what was taken from you at any cost in this Minimalistic Survival Horror.

name: Ai Suru Tsuma, Nagisa no Uwaki Kokuhaku Okuyukashii Tsuma no Karada ga, Aitsu no Geki Piston de Torokete Ita Shinjitsu
description: Sin descripción

name: Shinjuku Hearts
description: Skateboard into the bustling city of Shinjuku in this beautiful, hand drawn, adult visual novel. Follow the misadventures of Guy as he humorously pursues the affection of sexy ladies and discovers their heartfelt stories. Which girl will you choose?

name: Swimsuit Samurai
description: This wonderful nude beach has been invaded by a horde of women in admittingly fashionable swimsuits, so it's up to a lone naked samurai to enforce the undress code!

name: Club Velvet Rose: Midnight Bliss
description: Indulge in Club Velvet Rose, an adult visual novel exploring the world of a sophisticated swingers club. Embrace desires, encounter intriguing characters, and dive into a world of passion. Expect stunning animations, inspiring dialogue, and captivating situations. Let the journey begin.

name: Ai Suru Tsuma no Ana wa Tanin no Ana Datta... Bishiri o Sashidashi, Aniki no Nikubou o Onedari Suru Midarazuma
description: Sin descripción

name: Multiverse Crush
description: Multiverse Crush is a visual novel for adults where you have to save the Multiverse and help a bunch of cool girls along the way. They would be very grateful!

name: Hope's Final Defense
description: Hope's Final Defense is an action roguelite arena shooter. Strategize and build your skill deck, craft deadly synergies, and fight hordes of enemies. Choose unique upgrades, obtain powerful equipment, and fight creatures from Negativia to protect humanity's last hope.

name: Impact Trial: The Lost Planet
description: Impact trial: the lost planet is a space adventure videogame where we will have to escape from an inactive planet through the Impact Trial program.

name: Akatsuki Zero
description: Gripping single-player campaign with a rich, branching narrative. Fast-paced multiplayer modes for co-op and competitive play. Diverse arsenal of weapons and equipment. Strategic gameplay that rewards teamwork and smart tactics.

name: Danger Close VR
description: A VR Mil-Sim by Rockedge Studios

name: Doomsday Cave
description: This is the post-nuclear war post-apocalyptic underworld as the background of the horizontal action survival game, you have to constantly collect resources to maintain their own and their family's survival consumption.

name: Saddle Up and Drive: El Contrabandista
description: Saddle Up & Drive is a top down car game. Gotta hustle and rustle up some cash. Get involved in shady business with underground stills, land an honest job or race in the County Competition! Every day's a fresh start, and a new job awaits ya!

name: Regenesis Ultimatum
description: Regenesis Ultimatum is a short cosmic horror game set in a dead universe where every planet is barren, every sun is burned out. Only one bastion of life remains; threatened by an unfathomable entity of your own creation.

name: The Shaman's Ark
description: The Shaman's Ark is a journey through mysterious and dark lands, full of dangers and strange encounters. As a enigmatic Shaman, you will embark on a quest to battle monsters in order to save the Ark, or condemn it to eternal darkness.

name: Cluck-a-Thon
description: Cluck-a-Thon: Merge and create extraordinary chickens in this enchanting indie adventure. Discover unique chickens and immerse yourself in a charming world of feathered fun! Join the clucking frenzy today!

name: Dark Life Excalibur
description: Dark Life: Excalibur is a fantasy action adventure that tells the story of Aron, a human who is linked to the most famous and legendary sword of all time: Excalibur.

name: Jump Mechanic
description: A cute 2d platformer with an emphasis on intuitive, expressive controls. Jump, twirl, roll, dive, spin, and more across 6 diverse pixel art worlds.

name: Legendary Pilots
description: A stylised and unique flight simulator

name: Obscure Depths
description: Plunge into the unknown with Obscure Depths, an adventure of exploration, survival, resourcefulness, and teamwork. Each dungeon is a crucible of untapped potential, wealth of unseen opportunities, and an expedition into the unknown. Adventurer, are you ready to face what lurks in the Obscure Depths?

name: Lost Color
description: In the world of lost color, light is lost and only darkness descends. He has many conversations with various cute monsters he encounters in it, and sometimes has thrilling battles with powerful monsters. Investigate the whole world, restore the color they lost, and save them.

name: Ad Victoriam
description: Ad Victoriam lets you experience large scale immersive battles and lead Caesar's legions to victory in a groundbreaking simulator! You can start up custom battles or play a full strategy game as you conquer Gaul and establish the Roman Empire!

name: Ashes to Ashes
description: Ashes to Ashes is a 2D bullet heaven game set in a dark post-apocalyptic fantasy world. You play as an emissary of an ancient AI tree that sends you out onto the banished land in hopes of fighting off the evil, returning the world to its peaceful state.

name: Radiant: Guardians of Light
description: Embark on an epic quest in "Radiant: Guardians of Light." Chosen by the spirit of light, battle against Gultar, and his corrupted elemental bosses. Unleash your powers, and team up in solo or coop mode to save the realm from tyranny. Will you restore balance or succumb to eternal darkness?

name: Niwatori ni Natta Ore: Kodoku na Majou to no Itsuka-kan
description: Sin descripción

name: Dum Game
description: Experience the exhilaration of Dum Game, a competitive multiplayer party sensation! Outmatch your rivals in thrilling rounds to claim victory and become the ultimate champion.

name: Huntsville
description: Huntsville is a Western Horror Shooter with Survival Elements. Try to survive in the cursed mountains of Huntsville alone or with your friends! Various paranormal entities in different forms and with distinct abilities roam around the valley waiting for their prey.

name: Grouphack
description: Grouphack is a survival roguelike where you embody a security program and defend the Mainframe from rogue programs. In each level, disintegrate hundreds of enemies, collect game-changing upgrades to create a unique build, and survive until the timer runs out.

name: Orpheus: Tale of a Lover
description: ORPHEUS: Tale of a Lover is a fast-paced FPS experience with a touch of absurd comedy. Join Orpheus on his quest to reclaim his beloved wife amidst a bureaucratic hell. No pun intended.

name: Captain Buttface
description: Captain Buttface is the superhero we all need and want, he is here, so bow down to our saviour.

name: Thousands Rooms Under the Reality
description: Thousands Rooms Under the Reality is a coop survival-horror game that take place inside the backrooms where the players must cooperate together to complete the chapters in order to reaches the deepest level possible while fighting hordes of scary monsters.

name: The Ravendree Oracle
description: Meet devils, diviners, bootleggers, and showstoppers in a 1920s murder mystery. Solve puzzles, unlock clues, and learn about suspects in this whodunit visual novel!

name: Midforest Survivor
description: Midforest Survivor is a survivor-like VR game with roguelite elements. Take your guns, shoot the hordes of monsters and upgrade your skills. In this game, you are an ordinary human trying to survive in the middle of an ordinary deadly forest.

name: Godforsaken
description: You are in a place forgotten by God. Once here, no one will ever remember you again. The only way to survive here is to take up arms and go in search of supplies. Have you met a new ally along the way? Don't trust him, because he can always stab you in the back. Can you live to see another day?

name: Midnight Thunder Drive
description: Get your dose of '80s nostalgia! Blaze through neon streets, master turbo boosts, and chase victory. With a synthwave soundtrack and addictive gameplay, unleash your inner '80s racer!

name: Last Hope
description: Engage in intense 5v5 Tactical FPS battles as a skilled military operative. With One Hit Headshots and bullet penetration, precision is vital. Rise through ranks in competitive mode for exclusive rewards. Experience the rush of tactical warfare like never before. Can you be the worlds Last Hope?

name: Chains of the Goddess
description: Chains of the Goddess is a delivery mechanism for uncomfortable existential questions, cleverly disguised as a roguelite game. Our lawyers warn that you should not follow financial or medical advice dispensed by the Goddess.

name: Traitors in the Hood
description: Traitors of the Hood is a 3D, Multiplayer game for 8 players, which takes place on a foreign planet after rocket fatal crash. With magic, guns and tools, repair your rocket and escape, or kill whole crew as traitor

name: Cats Game
description: It is a cat game where you can control a kitty. Eat, drink, play with toys. Run from a dog, drop the vase. Do what usually cats do. Say meow. Explore the world. It is a cat adventure simulation.

name: Son of Sparta
description: Son of Sparta: Is the first action game to feature a GAY love story-line. Play as Actarius, the ultimate Spartan warrior as he battles he's way through Hades underworld to be with he's beloved once more...

name: Roving Rovers
description: Roving Rovers is a lunar rover simulation representative of the Australian Rover Challenge of 2023. It replicates the challenges that teams in the challenge will perform!

name: Blind Hope
description: A first-person survival horror with a cosmic twist, where you must blindly navigate a decayed historic manor swarming with warped children with only your vague memories and peripheral senses to guide you. Will your sanity hold? Or will blind hope turn to blind despair?

name: The Secret Ties of Strandcliff
description: A detective game where you fiddle information to your advantage. As an owner of a small bar, listen to visitors of your establishment, overhear their gossiping, collect information and then use to manipulate their thoughts and actions.

name: Sword sand Shotguns
description: Swords and Shotguns is a Sandbox Survival MMORPG, combining elements of PvE and full loot PvP with intense real-time combat. Gather resources, craft power gear, and shape the player-driven economy. The entire world is a massive big server.

name: VR Dinosaur City War
description: Dinosaurs escaped from human captivity and faced human tank artillery attacks in the city. Players control dinosaurs to fight back against human tanks.

name: Sudoban
description: Sokoban offers a fresh, new, mind-bending twist on the logic puzzles you love! Clear the board by moving and pushing blocks to line them up in rows and columns of unique numbers! Feed your brain with hand-crafted puzzles built to simultaneously challenge and relax you!

name: Legends of Duels
description: Legends of Duels is a turn-based multiplayer TCG where champions with unique abilities engage in strategic duels. Build your deck and challenge the world!

name: London Cab
description: Imagine yourself as a 19th-century London carriage driver. You must be vigilant, as danger lurks at every corner. Darkness and challenging times make surviving in this world even until the next day difficult. You must be brave and make wise decisions to endure in this gloomy world full of perils.

name: Senju
description: Senju is a VR experience of traditional Japanese dance (Nihon-Buyo). It is developed in cooperation with Senju-Ryu school of traditional Japanese Dance. You can watch a master of Nihon-Buyo dance and study the motions in detail.

name: Monochrome Heights
description: Monochrome Heights is a fast paced, challenging 2D platformer inspired by games like Super Mario Bros. and Megaman. It features crisp pixel art, a unique color swapping mechanic, and lots of robots.

name: Shadows of Fate
description: "Shadows of Fate" is an exhilarating fusion of fantasy medieval elements, bullet hell mechanics, and dungeon crawling. Step into a mesmerizing world where ancient prophecies intertwine with relentless combat, as you embark on a quest to uncover the secrets shrouded in darkness.

name: King Arthur's Petaldust Saga
description: 800 years under the spiked heels of the English. WE DO NOT FORGIVE, WE DO NOT FORGET, NEVER SURRENDER! Journey with King Arthur in this unforgettable visual novel, as he engages in frivolous antics throughout England. Encounter ghastly apparitions, ragamuffins and gasp... ENGLISHMEN! ARGH ARGH ARGH!

name: Elite Rogue
description: Exciting, ever-changing 3rd person roguelike. Defeat monsters, collect powerful loot, and continuously strengthen yourself. Experience indefinite exploration or face the ultimate challenge of the final boss. How far will you push your limits?

name: A True Story
description: A True Story is a turn-based strategy RPG based on "A True Story" (a sci-fi story from the 2nd century) by Lucian of Samosata.

name: Dreaming Chicken
description: Explore and climb high and wide in the mysterious adventure of a chicken who wants to fly and fulfill his dreams.

name: Misgiven
description: Misgiven is a 2D sci-fi adventure about the lump in your throat and how difficult it can be to say certain things. Stranded in a city of masks and toxic fog, find people you can trust and, via a tangible dialog system, experience how scary and awkward, but also how fulfilling, communication can be.

name: Biotopia
description: A slow-paced and relaxing game where you build beautiful, diverse landscapes, and create suitable habitats for any animals you attract along the way.

name: DanDan
description: It's simple, but it needs some ingenuity! ? An action game where bullets keep bouncing! If you attack to defeat an enemy, the bullets you fire will continue to bounce off, so you will continue to avoid your own attacks. Proceed through the stages by adjusting the timing and position of your attacks.

name: Tiny Europe
description: Do you like to "paint the map", but tired of the complexity? We present to your attention the most stupid and primitive strategy in the world!

name: StarStorm
description: StarStorm is an RTS AutoBattler which pits players and their personal fleet of starships against mysterious enemies in a fierce tug-of-war.

name: Moving Corpse
description: The moving corpse. A body that lies dead is resurrected in search of the flesh of the living. You, a rookie female detective, scramble through the streets of Japan to solve this mysterious case!

name: Far Out: Selene
description: Step into the role of lab technician Zack Paterson and uncover the mystery of Selene's expedition. With no maps or guidance to rely on, your wits become the sole compass guiding the path. Prepare yourself for an exciting adventure, as multiple endings await your decisions!

name: Swimming Dynasty
description: Take your mark... Go! Create up to 5 characters, upgrade your swimmers, recruit swimmers to improve your team and climb to the top division. Build your team from scratch and compete for the championship! Start your dynasty now!

name: Jumpy Paws: World Adventures
description: Casual adventure game where you are a brave puppy traveling the World and discovering new cultures and challenges. Visit iconic places of the world and use unique dog skills to unfold this short and cute story.

name: Walk the Times
description: Walk the Times is a 3D roguelite RPG that will transport you to an island lost to the currents of fate. Your mission is to rescue the fate of your timeline from the brink of collapse. Will you beat the clock and emerge triumphant, or succumb to the relentless passage of time?

name: The Ebbing: A Coastal Tale
description: It's the year 1870. You have to solve the mysterious death of Bente Hansen: question the villagers, detect clues, combine them to new information and decipher the mysterious signals that arrive at the station of the first transatlantic telegraph cable in a little village on the northsea coast.

name: Astrotester
description: An action adventure game. Complete story tasks at various locations-levels. Fight against the dominant forces of the Stream and hostile creatures. Learn more about the world of the Star Network.

name: The Dynasty Of Cats
description: The Dynasty Of Cats is a Match-3 Game,which featured card game,rougue,and base construction

name: Serania: Path of the Scion
description: Choose, explore, interact, fight, solve, gather, trade! An immersive text-based RPG that seamlessly merges the best elements of RPGs, choose-your-own-adventure stories, visual novels, and interactive fiction.

name: Miskatonic University
description: Manage the world's leading university for delving into the occult and dark mysteries of the world. Retrieve and study eldritch artifacts of ruinous bygone races, probe the limits of acceptable science, & explore occult sites around the world. But to what end? Will you save humanity, or doom us all?

name: Falling Limbs
description: Falling Limbs is a 2 to 4 player online and local platform fighter game. Customize your samurai, wield a variety of weaponry and vanquish every rival

name: Flying Toyz
description: Fast, competitive sport game where all the map objects are interactable. In Flying Toyz you fight using gadgets to outplay the opponents while playing in an alive room, full of environmental hazards, from which you should stay away!

name: Kamigami: Spirits of the Nature
description: Get ready for another card battling adventure on Kamigami! Easy to play, hard to master, collect brand new cards, face over 80 opponents, build your strategies and restore peace to the gods!

name: Llamalandia
description: In Llamalandia you play as a cute Llama that got lost in the mountains, prepare yourself to explore a new world that you have never seen before, while you embark on a magical journey across the Bolivian altiplano, facing many challenges in order to find your family and save the rest of your species.

name: Astra Intra
description: A short space-horror game where you desperately try to keep the crew members of a defective spaceship alive, as you are all the last hope for humanity's survival.

name: Rhythm Dodge
description: Rhythm Dodge is a retro styled music based game where instead of hitting notes on the rhythm of the music you have to dodge them. You play as two sides that you control independently. Making you test your eye-hand coordination.

name: Strange Seed
description: Evolve your creature using parts from mammals, birds, insects, and even dinosaurs! From your humble beginnings as a shape-shifting slime, build up your genetic potential and adapt your way through the islands of New Haven.

name: Slug Gear
description: Slug Gear is an action-packed Metroidvania within a universe of insect-human hybrids. Collect unique trinkets, fight powerful bosses and discover the lost lore of the world!

name: Moonlight Mayhem
description: Moonlight Mayhem is a 4-15 player multiplayer horror game where the goal is to eliminate werewolves for humans or vice versa. To do this, you can team up with players, but make sure they are on your side or they could decide to backstab you.

name: Overlord
description: YOU ARE THE OVERLORD. Destroy the thousands that try to slay you and take your kingdom. In your arsenal: tons of deadly weapons, flashy abilities, and shady items. choose between them to completely overwhelm you enemies.

name: Golful
description: Run, jump, and putt yourself around the map in this golf-themed puzzle platformer. Collect items, test your knowledge, and think critically to solve various physics-based puzzles.

name: Locator
description: A Geoguessr-inspired detective game set on an alien planet. Pinpoint the exact locations of photos to track down missing archeologist Abigail Lidari. Cross-reference journal entries, decipher cryptic symbols, and uncover the mysteries of an ancient civilization. Find her... before it’s too late.

name: Zilla: Shadow of the Bridge
description: An indie action-adventure game about a 'Zilla battling evil Bridge-Kin in San Francisco, vanquishing over-the-top bosses and building alliances on his way to Reach, Overcome, and Vanquish his Kaiju clan's ultimate foe - the Golden Gate Bridge. The Fiend shall Fall!

name: Fabled Frontier
description: An open world survival action rpg set in a procedurally generated world inspired by fairy tales. Build your hero as well as a home!

name: Lobber
description: LOBBER is a top down hack and slash where you can hack, slash, and chop your way to victory! Cut off skeleton's heads and catch their skulls to perform powerful moves!

name: Phantom Peak
description: Phantom Peak is an thrilling horror game set in an industrial complex. Solve the mysteries of the experiments conducted within these walls and discover the horrifying truth.

name: Fabled Style
description: Welcome to Fabled Style, the multistyle VR rhythm game. Test your skills using different Warrior Styles on the beat of the music. Strike the notes using multiple weapons while playing through the different songs. Are you up to the challenge to master them all to become the next Fabled Warrior?

name: Karpatia: Order of the Comet
description: Karpatia is a narrative-driven first-person mystery game, emphasizing the exploration and uncovering of secrets. Help the hero unravel the mystery of an ancient book and stop a dangerous organization that is preparing a global catastrophe. Solve puzzles, explore the castle and its surroundings.

name: Dungeon of the Forgotten King
description: In DUNGEON OF THE FORGOTTEN KING you will fight against dangerous enemies to obtain Gold, which you can offer to the Magic Altars to become more powerful, hoping to find the way out of the dungeon.

name: Oni Academy
description: Play as a new recruit to the "Oni Academy", an establishment which specializes in recruiting female demon hunters. Hunt down demons, advance your character and play alone or with friends.

name: Superbot Arena
description: Design your own Superbot and fight alongside or against others in this VR battle arena! Make your own motion gestures to activate a variety of abilities and effects to aid you in destroying your opponents. Includes AI bots and different game modes like "smash off" and endless play.

name: Exodus: Sunflower on the Horizon
description: You're given a chance to find out what really makes the earth turn... But will you like what you see? Exodus is the ultimate sci-fi RPG experience about love, friendship, and deadly monsters.

name: Tattoos and Tulips
description: Follow Chrys as he declares to swear off dating in favor of focusing on himself and hanging out with friends. That is until a very sweet, and very hot tattoo artist named Shay enters the picture. Has Chrys' bad luck gone away?

name: ExoSoul
description: Exosoul is an adrenaline-fueled top-down shooter that will test your skills and reflexes. Fight for your life against relentless enemies while trying to synchronize your body and soul. You have a powerful arsenal of weapons at your disposal, but you'll need to use them wisely if you want to survive.

name: Fire All Weapons
description: Roguelike deckbuilding tactical deckbuilding space combat. Make your way home through hostile alien space. Find new technologies, build your deck, survive, and make it home in one piece.

name: Defenders of Kronos
description: Defeat the corrupted inhabitants of Kronos in this 4-player online co-op adventure. Uncover the source of corruption, collect unique weapons and items, and upgrade your arsenal with stars. Join forces with friends, vanquish hordes of enemies, and save Kronos in this epic co-op experience.

name: City of Corals
description: Save the coral reef city in this cute tiny adventure game! Meet the colourful residents of this underwater city, explore the streets, befriend different species of fish and help them restore the corals to their former glory!

name: Night of Wolves
description: Take on an outbreak of lycanthropy in this medieval 2D “souls-like”! Master an intuitive but demanding combat system, meet enigmatic characters, defeat terrifying bosses and unravel an original plot of revenge and fear. Will you eradicate the plague or succumb to lycanthropy?

name: Detective Patch
description: Detective Patch is an adorable 2D turn-based RPG where you solve mysteries and interrogate enemies. Battle menacing foes, meet quirky characters, and solve the mystery of the stolen ruby.

name: Sleeve Shock
description: You've just come back from a job, you don't remember what went wrong but all your crew mates are weirdly horny and angry at you, how will you survive their "frustrations" vented upon you?

name: Spire of Lust & Fetish
description: This magical land has been swamped by darkness and horrible creatures. The Kingdom is defenseless since the enemy captured the girls in charge of protecting it! Rescue them one by one, and you’ll be thanked generously ~

name: Wild
description: Wild is a survival game inspired by the "7vsWild" series. The goal is to survive, fight against dangerous animals, and build your shelter. For that, you are only allowed to take one bottle as equipment, so prepare it well in advance.

name: The Casino Empire
description: "The Casino Empire" is an exciting game that puts you in charge of building your own Las Vegas-style casino empire.

name: Forehead Chip
description: Be the first to get a chip implanted in your forehead! Join the IMPLANT CORPS and capture Holdouts in a 2D cyberpunk future - inspired by 80s and 90s sci-fi.

name: Deckstrander
description: A survival + deck building + story generated simulator. Build shelter, craft weapon & tools, hunt food, tame animal, fight creature, slavery, and story generation with character traits.

name: Ar3na
description: Ar3na is a top-down battle arena game that blends fast-paced action with strategic gameplay. Engage in heart-pounding battles against epic foes as you fight for supremacy in a variety of dynamic arenas. Use your wit, reflexes, and cunning tactics to outmaneuver your opponents and emerge victorious.

name: Manascape
description: A roleplaying game set in a dark, new scifi fantasy universe. Make choices and lead your companions through a deep, branching story. Blast your enemies with magic or slice them with your manableid in tactical real time with pause combat as you unravel the mystery of the Lythlavir.

name: Time To Wake Up
description: Imagine being stuck inside a dream. Guided by a voice, you set out to the depths of your mind. Be careful not to dwell in the past or you'll get stuck in its mud. Now go. It's time to wake up.

name: Circle of Orion
description: A mother and son are transported from the 21st Century to the mystical world of Orionis. Meet fantastical characters, battle powerful monsters, explore a dense overworld, and discover the truth behind this mysterious world in an adventure akin to RPG classics.

name: Let Them Come: Onslaught
description: Survive the relentless offensive of the alien horde in Let Them Come: Onslaught, a sci-fi survival roguelite. The pursuit of the perfect build and an ever-expanding arsenal of abilities are the keys to your success.

name: Wild Mutation
description: Explore and survive a post-apocalyptic sci-fi future, humanity is pushed to almost an extinction, and genetic hybrids rule the world. In a harsh open-world environment filled with danger, craft tools,shelter and weapons, and survive while the war between humans and hybrids echos the wastelands.

name: Battle Craft
description: Battle Craft is a real-time online strategy game with unique heroes, settlement development, and conquering other players online. Strategically place defenses, level up heroes. Experience the one-of-a-kind realistic physics in epic battles on the Steam platform!

name: ClownScapades Rally
description: You met him from your birthday party, as one of your family members had hired him to entertain the crowd, however things go dark as you start to have nightmares about him and you end up in strange, unfamiliar places within them...

name: Grid-M
description: Grid-M is an action packed grid based Rhythm game featuring an amazing soundtrack. Rise to the top through a welcoming progression system to promoting improvement at all skill levels. Low floor, highest Peak. It time to click to the Grid-M!

name: Draken's Shrine
description: A metroidvania action platformer set in an epic fantasy world where a barbarian woman raised in the wild, pushed by her mother stories about her father decides to look for his final resting place.

name: Climbing Mountain Sins
description: Embark on a challenging journey of redemption in Climbing Mountain Sins. Conquer sins, and climb to heavenly salvation. Master climbing, face obstacles, uncover secrets. A keyboard-breaking, nail-biting adventure. Can you ascend and overcome your inner demons? Rise to absolution!

name: Kiru Kiru Kiru
description: Incredibly fast 2D-arena shooter, where you can not stop. Inspired by contemporary shooters, concentrated, ultraviolent and compressed into two dimensions with dark industrial aesthetics. You are a quick saw, ripping flesh and letting the blood out. //Will you start a massacre?

name: Dash For Your Life
description: Dash For Your Life is a clever mix of the platformer and horror genres. Your multitasking skills will be brutally tested as you attempt to jump through levels while avoiding startling jump scares from the monsters chasing you.

name: Teratale: Tide of Wishes
description: Travel with your mysterious partner Tupa, fight powerful monsters, discover treasures and secrets scattered around the world, and uncover the truth of the world, Tupa and yourself with the help of the tide of wishes.

name: The Shadow's Terror
description: You are the unfortunate lab rat of the shadow people, will you prove humanity redeemable, or will you succumb to their terror?

name: Realm of the Dead
description: This is a low-polygon 3D game with top-down and first-person perspectives. Control any character, switch perspectives, collect items, and rescue teammates. Use AI or the formation system to operate characters. Face hordes of zombies and respond based on your choices.

name: Operator: Drones
description: "Operator: Drones" is a drone arcade/simulator that puts you behind the remote terminal of your equipment. Fly high - hit low.

name: Nightmare Manor
description: Welcome to Nightmare Manor - a terrifying horror game that will take you to an old manor steeped in dark history. In this game, you will feel the cold breath of the past, finding yourself in a place where sinister entities live.

name: Sword & Spatula
description: A cooperative game for two players where the players take on the role of a skilled cook and a fearless warrior. Together, you must defend against waves of enemies while preparing delicious meals to keep yourself satiated. Two players, one mission: Survive together!

name: FarmTech
description: FarmTech is a pixel-art roguelike farming simulator with tower defense/action elements. Embark on a special mission in a world conquered by aliens. Plant, harvest, loot and gain money in the mornings. Defend your farm against waves of enemies in the night.

name: Keep Killing
description: This is an alternative game where you only need to live to fight, fight to live

name: The Stubborn of WakGood: Afterheat
description:
This game is a fan game by YouTuber Woowakgood with the motif of Isaac Original.
We respect the original Isaac Original, and we do not want to be a substitute for that game. The creators do not distribute the game for a fee or generate revenue through copyright. This game can be downloaded from YouTuber Woowakgood's Naver fan cafe "왁물원".

name: Hospital Doctor: Fix me up for Kids (Boys & Girls)
description: Become a hero of the hospital - help and heal in Hospital Doctor!

name: Lumiterra: Embers of the Legacy
description: Lumiterra is a multiplayer, open-world survival crafting game where you can battle, farm with your friends, or explore mysterious creatures in a vast world!

name: Ketchapp Tennis
description: Welcome to Ketchapp Tennis! Challenge yourself or your friends (via Local WiFi) in this new exciting Tennis game!

name: Fiery Arrow
description:
It is an archery game that hits a moving target by shooting a fire arrow.
To track the target, move the device to the left or right.
Feel the fun of tracking the target and the pleasure of archery at the same time.

name: Make Dogs in Temple Jump 2020
description: Make the three dogs jump over the obstacles while they are running!

name: Soccer Clicker
description: Tap your way to glory! Collect cash, recruit players, and manage your team as you battle against real opponents from all over the world.

name: Cobi Shoot
description:
Take aim and get ready for awesome shooting action!
Have fun and challenge yourself or play with all your friends to see who's the best!

name: Hill Dirt Master 3
description: Experience thrills of off-road racing by Hill Dirt Master 3. Large selection of challenges and upgradeable parts offer you a varied racing experience.

name: Parks and Rekt
description:
You got fired from your job at the "Parks and Recreation" department. In a fit of rage, you took your ex-employer's vehicle and wreck havoc on all the parks in the city.
Standing in your way are the city's air drone guards. Crash and destroy as many public park property as you can before those pests get to you.
You might not be employed at "Parks and Recreation" anymore, so let this be your chance to "redecorate" the city's parks for one last time.

name: Turbo Snow Skiing
description: Ski your way through several snow covered mountain levels as fast as you can but be careful to land on your skis or you will wipeout with ragdoll physics. Tilt your device to lean your rider and perform flips. Press the turbo button to fire up the jet turbine attached to your skis for a burst of speed. Hit the nitro turbo boost canisters all around the levels for an even greater speed burst. Navigate your way to the finish line using hidden ice caves for shortcuts. Try the stunt levels which test your skills in performing as many backflips or frontflips as you can. Find and unlock hidden levels throughout the game.

name: Seduce Her Harem
description: Play as Vera, the young Shadow Empress in this choice-driven Dating Sim Visual Novel. Meet, seduce, and... play with the five mythical men of this reverse harem! Come in now, don't be shy...

name: MagicBeans
description: An action role-playing game. The plot is full of ups and downs, innovative gameplay, and lively battles, including treasure hunting, seaside leisure hunting, and tower defense elements. I believe it can bring you unexpected surprises.

name: Healer
description: This is a single-player action roguelike game in which you play the role of a doctor, select a disease from various medical records, and control various human immune guards equipped with various core weapons to enter various human body parts and fight against various pathogens.

name: Neural Nexus
description: Neural Link Corporation developed a powerful AI that unexpectedly went rogue. As an employee, you must destroy the servers storing the AI's network model to mitigate the damage and uncover the reasons behind the AI's loss of control.

name: Quickclaw
description: Quickclaw is a 2d action/platform fully handmade with sprite animations. Take on the role of Dynamo City's newest vigilante Quickclaw in her fight against organized crime with an original storyline and many new characters in order to give the experience to play into an animated series from the 90s!

name: Florida Love Stories
description: “Florida Love Stories is a romantic comedy point-and-click adventure and yuri dating sim. Play as investigative journalist Veronica Hernandez as she explores the town of Boca Castor, meets beautiful women and maybe even falls in love along the way.

name: Family Guy: Stewie 2.0
description:
You are Stewie.

Wanting to accelerate your plans of offing your mother and crushing Europe under a tyrannical bootie, you turn to the mad science of self-cloning.

But you were too successful! Your clone, Stewie 2.0, hates your family even more than you do and steals them away to a secret base hidden deep within "siburbia"!

Liberate your family by infiltrating "siburbia" and combating your clone's evil army with your own mechanical horde.

Victory shall be yours!

name: DOOM 87: The Lost World
description: "DOOM 87: The Lost World" is an upcoming vanilla-compatible DOOM II megawad. The first few maps are fairly easy, but the difficulty increases significantly by the start of the Hell episode on MAP12. Currently, a 21-map beta release is available and features some epic vanilla DOOMING action! Get ready for an exciting new adventure as Doomguy locates a secret hellspawn base on Earth known as "The Lost World."

name: I am a Serial Killer
description:
Martin decided to join a sect called "The Enlightened", who seek to bring to life a mysterious being to eliminate all evil in the world.

How far are you able to go to achieve your goals?

name: Cranky Driller
description: Mr. Driller just got Cranky!

name: Bounce & Roll
description: Control and guide the ball through a series of obstacles, testing your skills and abilities in a 3D environment, either solo or with a friend.

name: Volatility
description:
Explore an interconnected world unfolding as you acquire new abilities, each region brimming with secrets to uncover as you learn your purpose in a collapsing artificial world.
Volatility is a Zelda-like with metroidvania elements, which sees you navigating a bizarre landscape in search of a way home.

name: Hiker: Heropack Creed
description: Sin descripción

name: VR Thrills
description: Sin descripción

name: Flying Cut
description: Sin descripción

name: Bumper Ball
description:
Bumper Ball is coming!
You can eliminate balls by clicking and moving five or more same color balls into a line. The game is over when you cannot move any ball or board is fully filled by balls.

name: Run Kelvin: Penguin Escape
description:
A little baby penguin named "Kelvin", who does not know how to swim yet, was left behind and now needs to run and escape to his family and safety.
During his run in Antarctica, he has to do his bit to fight pollutants left by human activities and clean up the environment to reduce a few degrees Kelvin (or Celsius/Fahrenheit) as for him, melting ice is not just about rising sea levels and global warming, it is not being able to see his family ever again in the changing landscape.
Run, jump, even try and fly he must, but at the same time avoid his natural enemies and hit back at the man-made ones.

name: Pocket Family: My Dream House
description:
Design your home and create a dream house in Pocket Family! Create a virtual family filled with adorable animated characters and help build the house of their dreams through match 3 collapse games and puzzles.
Build a family with an amazingly cute and fun cast of characters that are ready to move in and live in your new house! Play puzzle games to complete their requests for household items and keep your home happy and growing!
Play match 3 collapse games to design and build each room any way you please. Decorate your room and watch the furnishings grow, or help your new virtual family with their requests.

name: Spin a Stick
description: Spin-a-Stick is a maze puzzle game with a twist. Just swipe your finger and guide your spinner thru levels to find a way out. Press and swipe anywhere to move. Avoid hitting anything.

name: Into the Twilight
description:
Featured in New & Noteworthy, What We're Playing, What's Hot, and Number 1 in category in 15 countries.
Run, jump & roll!
Can you escape into the Twilight? Run, jump, roll and swing to avoid drops. traps, and enemies while you collect stars in the fastest time possible. Play through increasingly difficult levels in this furiously fun platformer with beautiful graphics and music.

name: Temporal War
description:
In 2027, on parallel Earth 103. The Red Army implemented a full blockade on the Tech Island to obtain control of chip technology and global dominance.
To counter the Red Army, the Tech Island allies formed the Blue Army, sparking intense warfare on the island and its surrounding waters...

name: BloodyXmas 2010
description:
BloodyXmas is a superb survival game for your iPhone and iPod Touch! Here comes the funniest, funnest Christmas ever!
This festive season, in such a joyous family time, even the kindest grandpa in the world has to start his chainsaw!
Creatures are rushing into Santa's workshop and they want to steal and destroy all the presents!
What can poor Santa do? How can he stop these evil minions?
Yeah, guess what - he kicks their asses and teaches them a lesson!
Here comes the funniest, funnest Christmas ever!
Check out Santa's arsenal: cleaver, saber, sledgehammer, chainsaw, and one massive secret super weapon. No one's gonna steal the children's presents! Come and get some!

name: Suck Eggs!
description:
All you have to do is suck eggs located on top of scrolling columns at random heights.
Includes 4 game modes that increase in difficulty. Eggs that you can suck include chocolate eggs, red eggs or golden eggs!

name: Super Sushi Smackdown
description:
Battle powerful samurais, pesky ninjas and flirtatious geishas... but don't forget there's plenty of sushi to be served in the highly addictive Super Sushi Smackdown.
Super Sushi Smackdown is an action-packed puzzle game that will test both your reflexes and your wit. Keep the customers happy by serving them sushi, but make sure to demonstrate your masterful skills by building up extreme chains and never-ending combos. Complete tricky challenges to level up and discover the powerful skills that hide within you.
Fun for the entire family, Super Sushi Smackdown has plenty to challenge the reflexes and wit of hardened gamers and casual fun-seekers alike.
Who would have thought a day in the life of a sushi waiter would be so addictive?

name: UpUp: Frozen Adventure
description:
UpUp is a frozen adventure. A platform game incredibly fun and addictive!!
In the game, you are an adventurer who need to run to reach the highest point of the mountain, facing snow and extreme cold. Time is your biggest enemy, you need to be quick to not freeze and die of cold. His agility is also important to face deadly and dangerous geysers and spikes.
UpUp offers an extremely simple mechanics, but very challenging. Besides having fun for hours, you can challenge your friends to see who will be the first to reach the highest point of the mountain.

name: Stuart Jump
description: Welcome to Stuart's world!

name: Beachside Bites: Sip & Munch
description: Welcome to Beachside Bites, the ultimate culinary adventure on the sunny shores! Get ready to tantalize taste buds, serve hungry beachgoers, and create mouthwatering treats in this exciting beachside restaurant game. As the sole character, it's up to you to run the show, from crafting delicious burgers, ice cream, drinks, pops, ice cream sandwiches, and cakes to personally delivering them to your satisfied customers.

name: Dragster Mayhem: Top Fuel Sim
description:
Experience the thrill of piloting a nitro-methane guzzling Top Fuel drag car producing over 9000 bhp on the iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch!
Wait for the three yellows and throttle down in the blink of an eye as you cover 1000 ft in less than 5 seconds.
Race on 4 different race tracks with increasing prize money. Win races and earn money to improve your dragsters chassis, engine and tires.

name: Nala Cat
description:
Join the world's most famous cat on Instagram, Nala Cat, on her adventure with her squad! Nala has escaped to an adventurous, magical land to have a “play date” with her family! Hop down tricky paths and slide down rivers to help Nala and her squad find the correct way home, but watch out!....not every path leads to victory! Catch Nala's favorite items like toilet paper to clear obstacles, and chickens to unlock her whole lovable crew!
Play for hours in this endless downhill adventure, challenge yourself to take the throne in the leaderboards, and become the top cat out there!
Nala's lovable squad consist of White Coffee, Luna Rose, Steve & Stella, and Spencer The Dog!

name: Puky
description: Who Is Master?! Come on !! Help Puky be a competent watch dog.

name: Second World War
description: Sin descripción

name: Bubble Burst: PlayWithPlanets
description:
Bubble pairing and popping takes a new dimension in this game. Pair similar planets in a dial and see how much you can pop in a minute or more.
Easy controls and special effects make this game and awesome time killer.
Multiple levels in this game is a plus point and each level gives you a new experience every time you play.

name: Prodigious Avian
description: Prodigious Avian is a casual game, where you play as Quercus thy magnanimous and attempt to evade the malignant clutches of the Robber Baron, who threatens to engulf you and all of Cymru. Flap your wings little birdie and do not allow the talons of an insidious wretch to besmirch your fair visage.

name: Run Bunny Home
description:
Help the bouncing bunny get home, jumping from platform to platform, pick up eggs, eat carrots, and bounce balloons, pick up your baby bunnies to get points along the way. Do not fall off the boards as you get home.
The game has 16 levels, after you make it to the bunny house you pass a level, and the next level is unlocked.
The higher levels get harder, you need to jump higher to make it, and it is easier to fall. The platforms are shorter, and some of them are rickety and will fall down when you jump on them.
You can skip a level if you have earned enough stars in the game, even if you don't pass a level, this can help if you just can't finish one level.
The game is supported by ads, but there is an in app purchase to turn all the ads off. There is another version of this game Run Bunny Kids that has no ads, no in app purchases, no videos, and all levels are unlocked for easy use by kids.
You can buy extra carrots with an in app purchase, but these are the same as the carrots you pick up in the game.
You can also get extra bunnies buy watching videos if you want, these can be traded in the store for extra lives, the adopt button watches those videos to get bunnies. Trade bunnies for extra lives in the store.
You should bring the baby bunnies you find along the platforms home with you instead, if you bounce into a baby bunny it comes with you. Get your baby bunnies home with you, and you earn those baby bunny points. Every 5 points gets you an extra life in the store.
After every game you can get to the store with the store icon, or you can get to the store when you pause the game with the pause icon by pushing the || sign during the game. If you press the + sign on the top of the purse, you go to the store.

name: Spoils of War
description: It was made by German Design Group in 1991 for DOS, C64, and Amiga, the game takes place on a different planet but is essentially an eco sim about colonization of the new world.

name: Motto! Yurutto Manaberu Classic
description: Sin descripción

name: Monoshiri Quiz Iroiro Shokubutsu
description: Sin descripción

name: Fushigi na Jikken Quiz!
description: Sin descripción

name: Motto Shiritai Uchuu no Hatena
description: Sin descripción

name: Evidence Destroyer
description: Sin descripción

name: Party Party Time + Character Skin 1 & 2 Pack Set
description: Sin descripción

name: Bunnerly
description: Alone and desperate, you become a glowing rabbit and enter the cyber-city to rescue your two little bunnies.

name: Differlands
description: A simple Spot-the-Difference can become a completely new game when combined with VR. Enjoy a Spot-the-Difference Game that goes beyond time and space! Only you and your sharp set of eyes can save the librarians of the Magic Library from their peril.

name: Bubble Blasters
description: Race against time and shoot giant bubble gums back to the vending machine in this sci-fi game!

name: Bilattice
description: Bilattice is a massive puzzle game featuring over 300 hand-crafted levels and tons of unique mechanics. The mechanics interact with each other in endlessly interesting ways to produce hours of mind-bending content. The sheer number of clever gimmicks offered by this game is hard not to appreciate.

name: Beyond Inseparable
description: The only one that matters to you in life has been taken. Enraged, you storm the hellish dungeons of Castle Ire to rescue and reunite. Hack and slash your way out of this nightmare together or perish with many who didn't.

name: Huxla Dungeon III
description: Huxla RPG Character make-up (more than 500 face glamour) + Occupation selection (20 occupations) Enchantment synthesis Sub-event Collectors will love the Armor Book and more! Huxla lovers will love the many features throughout the game! Create your own party and enjoy the Huxla experience!

name: Pick-a-Pocket
description: Stealth your way through Victorian-Era streets and Pickpocket your way to the top. Stay Vigilant as other thieves will be out and about, ready to steal your rewards or as easy marks to increase your stash. Avoid Bobbies, vanish from the light and disappear with your ill-gotten goods by day break.

name: Master the Sky
description: Unfolding a New Dimension of Possibilities as the lines between physical n digital reality blur, so does the limit of what you can achieve. Welcome to the future of drone piloting. This program opens the sky for everyone and shatters the ceiling of what you believe is possible.

name: Fungal Colony Simulator
description: You are but a humble Mushroom farmer. You feel the need to farm mushrooms.

name: The Tarot Experience VR
description: This is a story about you. A heroic journey to remember who you really are… the lead character in your very own story… about you! Afterwards life may never be the same again…

name: Uptown Outbreak
description: Use your driving and battling skills to defeat the virus and restore the game to its former glory.

name: SanGuo223
description: This is a RTS game, a war game about Three Kingdoms.Focus on the era of the Three Kingdoms when Zhuge Liang , and Cao Pi and Sun Quan.This game has a series of magical events, to tell the story of that era.

name: Grasshoping
description: Grasshoping is a 3D platformer in which you incarnate a grasshopper in search of a new home after humanity has polluted his valley.

name: NarKarma Engine A
description: Sin descripción

name: Yuji Naka's NES Game
description: Famous developer Yuji Naka claims to have developed a complete NES game, but was unreleased. In a Twitter post, the developer reveals interest in eventually releasing the game to the public if he could get permission from the involved companies.

name: Donkey Kong Jr.
description: An Apple II of Donkey Kong Junior, confirmed by magazine ads, but never released.

name: Donkey Kong Jr.
description: A Commodore 64 port of Donkey Kong Junior, confirmed by magazine ads, but never released.

name: Donkey Kong Jr.
description: An IBM PC port of Donkey Kong Junior, confirmed by magazine ads, but never released.

name: Mario Bros.
description: An IBM PC port of Mario Bros., confirmed by magazine ads, but never released.

name: Donkey Kong
description: An unreleased port of Donkey Kong for the BBC Micro. Not much is known about this port, being documented by The Atarisoft FAQ (unofficial source) and a blog post from an ex-employee.

name: Mario Bros.
description: In 1984, Atari planned to release Mario Bros. for their Atari 8-bit computer line (400/800/XL/XE). This port was identical to the previously released Atari 5200 version of the game. For unknown reasons, the game was canceled despite being fully finished. Mario Bros. would eventually receive an Atari 8-bit release in 1988, but this port was completely different than the 1984 prototype.

name: Donkey Kong 3
description: A planned Mini Classics version of Donkey Kong 3 was in the works, but never got released. In a stock image, it is mislabeled as Donkey Kong Junior.

name: 3D Classics: Tennis
description: A "3D Classics" version of Tennis was attempted because of the game's perspective, but the developers found that it looked unimpressive in 3D and that they would need to recode the collision detection from scratch.

name: Fluxis
description: A free, community-driven and open-source vertical scrolling rhythm game.

name: Transformers: Generation 2
description: Argonaut Games had made a deal to make a video game based upon the TV series of the same name. The game was to use the Super FX chip, an enhancement chip for the SNES that allowed 3D games to be much more possible. The game was cancelled in development, and was thought to be transferred over to another Super FX game, Vortex, which had a robot morphing into various vehicles. After an interview with Retro Gamer, it was said Vortex and Generation 2 were completely separate.

name: Doki Doki Meme Club
description: Are you tired of playing through depressing mods that have a heartbreaking ending? Or just burnt out on having to deal with all of the horrors that the characters must endure? Want to flip the sadness on its head? Then this mod is a must-see for you! The club members delve into the wonderful world of memes rather than literature, yet still have their own quirky problems to deal with

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Security Breach - Blast to the Past!
description: The team behind Blast to the Past! is taking the vanilla game and reshaping it to become something great, something that fans were hoping for. Blast to the Past! is a mod that restores all cut content back to Security Breach and takes a step further by adding new content and new gameplay features and bits of story to help rekindle the spark that is Security Breach! Have a Faz-errific day and keep a look out for teasers and the future release!

name: Theater Unrest
description: Indie horror game, inspired by creepypasta "The Theater".

name: Skibidi Battle: Toilets Attack
description: Unveil the universe of Skibidi Toilet, an addictive and engaging third person shooter video game inspired by the viral meme sensation.

name: Apollo 13
description: Apollo 13 is an adventure game that was developed and set to be published by Hi Tech Expressions, however was cancelled before release.

name: Gangnam Style
description: Gangnam Style is an unlicensed game based on the song of the same name that is included on the Xiaoshenyou CY-828 handheld system.

name: Griff Wild
description: Griff Wild was a cancelled first person shooter for the DS that was in development in 2009. The game was cancelled due to the lack of publishers willing to pick up the game.

name: Xyleron
description: Xyleron is a multiplayer, team based, low poly action FPS. Fight in fast-paced, strategic gameplay across a wide variety of maps for your opponent's appreciation.

name: The Valiant: Coat of Arms collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario FX
description:
Super Mario FX is the rumored earliest version of Super Mario 64, originally developed for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System using the powerful Super FX chip, used in games such as Star Fox, F-ZERO and Yoshi's Island. Given that it would predate any known build of Super Mario 64, the elusive Super Mario FX should've been in development in around 1993.

While there is no concrete evidence of Super Mario FX's existence, Miyamoto has gone on saying that he thought about creating a three-dimensional Mario game during the development of Star Fox. This has led to the assumption that a Mario game using the Super FX chip could've been in the works for the Super Nintendo, before the existence of the Ultra 64.

Another point of misconception is that the internal codename for the Super FX chip while in development was Super Mario FX, and also printed on it can be found the characters MARIO, being an acronym of "Mathematical, Argonaut, Rotation, & Input/Output".

name: Marionette
description: Marionette is a game which was worked on to be released for the Nintendo 64 and later for the GameCube, but ended up being cancelled. It was supposed to make the player control puppets. It was never shown publicly.

name: CatWorld
description: CatWorld is a 3D world exploration application. It's scary and lonely out there. Good luck, and may all your dreams come true.

name: Super FX Zelda
description:
A 3D graphics Zelda game, possibly a remake of Zelda II: Adventure of Link, which was briefly worked on for the Super Famicom with the Super FX chip technology. It was cancelled because the team started working on Star Fox 64.

The game was never shown publicly, but a 3D model of Link was found in the 2020 Gigaleak.

name: Obscure Chronicle of Dynasty
description: This is a "fictional, but plausible" strategy role-playing game with a plot which can be regarded as a history of the Three Kingdoms in a different realm. Thus, those who have received little or no attention in the original history may blossom in this very different time and space.

name: Vicious Star: Kill All
description: "Vicious Star" is an engaging turn-based strategy game, thrusting you into the role of a village guardian fighting intense battles. Within the game, you'll assemble your team, mixing and matching various characters and runes, and deploying unique skills to obliterate the monsters menacing your home.

name: White Day 2: The Flower That Tells Lies - Ep.3
description: Episode 3 of the last story of 'White Day 2: The Flower That Tells Lies' takes place when Ji-min Yoo, a freshman at Yeondu High School, returns to the school on the night of March 14, 2001. She tries to send So-young Han's older sister, Na-young Han's soul to the heaven.

name: Treasure Island: The Golden Bug - Extended Edition
description:
1827 – William Legrand, son of a fallen family, came to Sullivan Island, South Carolina, to flee the misery.
Wandering on the island, he discovers a rare bug, made of gold. He uses a piece of paper to take it. At night, he draws the bug on this same piece of paper, as he is explaining the adventure to his friend Edgar, standing in front of the fireplace.
As William takes back the paper, he realises that symbols appeared on it. It must be an invisible ink, revealed by the heat. From that moment, William thinks it is a Pirate’s document: Captain Kidd’s coded instructions to his hidden treasure… Help William find it!

name: 9 Elements
description:
No common volleyball, it's rather be called a combat. Super combat volleyball!!
Get ready for the exciting 1 on 1, action sport! Characters of 9 different elements are waiting for your Fight Ball!

name: Exo: Arena
description:
Exo: Arena turns a park or playing field into an augmented reality arena where you face off against your friends. Navigate virtual hazards as you run to avoid incoming fire. Bounce shots off virtual ricochets to surprise your opponents with blasts from behind. In Exo: Arena, your phone becomes your map and weapon. Last one standing wins.
Exo: Arena requires a big open space, a clear view of the sky, and a cellular data connection.

name: Frak
description: Challenge yourself or a friend to a game of Frak and see who has the fastest reactions.

name: Moto Wheelie
description:
Trapped inside the memory banks of a computer, Maya needs to find a way out.
Her only ride.. a cyber motorcycle in a stunts game program. It's a long way to escape, but one that she is determined to enjoy with super fast wheelies, and stunt loops jumping over ramps on this endless data highway.

name: Mimpi Volleyball
description:
Help Mimpi play some ball with the most fantastic creatures.
Enjoy distinctive, fantastic graphic of this minigame that is based on award winning Mimpi the game.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: The Drum Master! - One Piece Anime Songs Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Solar Systems For Kids
description: A family friendly casual game that teaches children about celestial bodies. Learn about the Sun, Earth, Jupiter, and the other celestial bodies that make up our Solar System. You or your child will also be able to create your own Solar System in a sleek and in-depth fashion!

name: The Tower of the Spells
description: The Tower of the Spells is a medieval fantasy RPG with pixelated graphics. Accompany Samuel Critchlow during his student years at the magic academy The Tower of the Spells located on the continent of Margrast, a land with many secrets for him to discover.

name: Airframe Ultra
description:
Welcome to the violent underground world of Ultra Circuit racing.

From the cracked asphalt of San Juaro and the Ysidro edgelands to the hulking megacities of the Texicali Zego zone, Airframe riders from all across the Southlands compete for fame, fortune, and a chance at glory… three feet above or six feet below.

name: Melody Quest
description: Join our lovable protagonist on a magical adventure through vibrant landscapes, where music reigns supreme. As you journey through the fantastical realms, you'll encounter delightful creatures and charming companions, each with their own unique musical talents.

name: Indigo
description: The Indigo mod for Ocarina of Time is an ambitious romhack that creates a new adventure focused on an alternate Hyrule in which you play as adult Link from the start.

name: Speedrunnerz
description: In this game, you will embark on various trails, each starting in a secure location. As you progress through the portals at the end of each trail, be prepared for increasing levels of difficulty. You are one of the best speedrunners out there!

name: Hector The Cat: Treasure Hunter
description: Hector the Cat: Treasure Hunter is a rogue-lite action-adventure. Explore and battle your way through procedurally generated levels to gather as many Treasure you Can and become the Best Treasure Hunter.

name: Sizif
description: Sizif is a 3D endless runner where you simply control a ball and avoid obstacles to generate score for the longest time possible and climb the leaderboard. During a game you can unlock bonuses to either make your run easier or generate more score.

name: Méandres
description: Méandres proposes an incursion through the connections of white matter in a virtual reality experience. We move through this mysterious and labyrinthine universe of fibre bundles that encompass us like a forest to explore, but this fragile environment will be affected by our presence and behaviour.

name: Crystal Math
description: An infinite math runner with varying speeds and difficulty to test your skills.

name: Treasure Island 2
description: Set your sails to the Caribbean! Step into the swashbuckling boots of an adventurer and escape to an exotic deserted island to loot pirates' buried treasure. Use your time wisely and match three or more treasures into lines - horizontal, vertical or diagonal. Do it right and the crazy pirate skeletons will do a jig just for you!

name: J. Lo: Fur Bully from the Block
description: PETA propaganda game originating sometime in the 2000s where the object is to avoid Jennifer Lopez and warn people of the dangers of making fur clothing.

name: Celestio 64
description: A mod for Super Mario 64 inspired by Celeste, making it a 2D platformer with focus on precision.

name: Irang: The Last Hope
description: In Joseon, a kingdom honoring the Four Deities, chaos reigns. Nobles have unleashed sealed evils in a power grab, causing calamities. Join Irang and Haru on a journey to liberate the Deities and reclaim Joseon's last hope.

name: Keepers
description: Keepers is a space-themed clicker game. You are an employee of a center tasked with saving a planet - a typical light-year.

name: End of Edge
description: End of Edge is a hardcore wuxia action game

name: Atominous
description:
Inspect every inch of a contaminated household.
Quarantine hazardous materials.
Encounter residents.
Put yourself in danger.
Be a professional.

name: Chamber of Hex
description: A 15-minute puzzle adventure game on a 9x12 sheet of paper. Explore rooms, figure out the secret codes and escape the chamber!

name: Bird Ball
description: You scream out and all your friends rush to their computers to fire up the next big thing in online multiplayer video game entertainment. Play with friends or alone and spawn in some friendly bird compatriots to play with or against. The aim is to score goals and have fun in the sandbox.

name: 3D Tan
description:
AR ball vs bricks numbers, Don't you like to try?
"3D Tan" is a real 3d physical collision arcade game.
It is easy to learn: drag or click to fire balls. You can continue to fire your balls.
Collect props and stars to increase your ball amount or size.
Break bricks to get scores.

name: Bacterial Takeover - Idle game
description:
The most unique and addictive of the idle clicker games is here!
Become tycoon of deadly bacteria and take over the Universe. This idle clicker game will take you on a new space journey. Expand and grow big numbers of bacteria with enchantments in idle production and rare minerals. Take on the challenge and discover the best gameplay and idle strategy to destroy as many planets as possible!

name: Blazing Snake
description: Blazing Snake is a fun, fast paced, video game inspired by classic arcade style games.

name: Chronology: Deluxe Edition
description: A platform-adventure game about time travelling, puzzle solving and a friendship between an Old Inventor and a Snail.

name: FastBall 2
description:
In FastBall, you control a rolling ball. In his way, there are many obstacles and his only ability is to jump. This is where he needs you, you'll make him jump by tapping the screen.
With this simple mechanic, FastBall 2 contains 145 action packed levels spawned across 5 level packs. Through the levels, you'll need a good timing, pure attention as well as decisions on which path to follow to reach the level end.

name: Final Freeway
description: Fast-paced old-school pure arcade racer.

name: Monkey Flight 2
description: Your favorite monkeys are back! This time they've carried their elastic, whippy, inflatable palm tree to THREE new places for more monkey-flinging fun.

name: Squish the Zombies
description: Sin descripción

name: Speedy Biker Xtreme
description:
Tilt your way to victory! An all new version of your favorite bike game is here!
Race against the computer, or challenge a friend with real-time head-2-head.
Speedy Biker 3 features 18 new track locations across the globe complete with bone-jarring jumps, dizzying whoop-de-doos, ramps, mud, and obstacles galore.

name: Space Invaders: World Defense
description:
Space Invaders have returned to conquer the world, this time from a different dimension.
Join the World Defense team to find, and defeat Space Invaders in your neighborhood.
As a member of the elite pilot force, you’ll defend your area from invasion in a first-of-its-kind immersive game experience.
