Engage in missions across dimensions from Augmented Reality to the parallel Invader world.

name: Tiny Ring
description:
Rev your engine and get ready for the ultimate test of speed and nerve - Tiny Ring!
The brakes are gone! Timing is everything as you guide your speeding race car around the tiny ring track with a single finger. How many laps can you handle?
So simple anyone can have a go, but only one can stand victorious a-top the Game Center leaderboard for completing most laps. Will it be you?
Fame and glory can be yours.

name: Top Gear: Stunt School HD
description: If you strapped a jet engine to a racing car would you be able to make it jump 100ft into the air? Possibly... and in Top Gear Stunt School you can try this plus loads more ridiculous stunts. There are over two billion different combinations of upgrades and add-ons that you can use to modify your car to try to beat the challenges!

name: Tunnel Ball 3D
description:
The fastest and most furious 3D Tunnel game on the AppStore.
Roll your galactic ball down the 3D tunnel at light speed. Avoid obstacles and grab space treasures to maximize your scores.

name: Path to the Devil
description: A replayable rouge like deck building game in an RPG environment. Travel down a path across an island to face the devil. Build a strong deck on the way by taking out the devil's mercenary army and completing various non combatant encounters.

name: Out of Fuel
description: Out of Fuel is an exciting and challenging game that puts you in control of a powerful chainsaw as you work to completely destroy various objects.

name: Active Defense
description: This is a strategy tower defense game where players need to choose the appropriate defense towers based on different maps and enemies. The game also offers a variety of defense towers, maps, and an endless mode waiting to be unlocked by the players!

name: Rogue Company: ViVi Starter Pack
description: The ViVi Starter Pack features everything you need to jump into the action. Gear up - things are about to get loud!

name: Minecraft: Biome Settlers 3 Skin Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Minecraft: Classic Skin Pack 5
description: Sin descripción

name: Escape From Lighthouse
description: Escape from Lighthouse of the vast universe. You are in a space prison called "Lighthouse" of space. A human experiment will be conducted. Escape from Lighthouse as you progress through a growing variety of experiments

name: Recalhorn
description: Play as a young boy and his white creature pet as you progress through sidescrolling levels using a magic flute or jumping on enemies to defeat them and gather fruit for points. Along the way, you characters will befriend animals which can be summoned and ridden bestowing new powers to both defeat enemies and traverse the land. At the end of each world, youll face a boss character. Your player has 5 hearts per life. This game ran on Taitos F3 system and was tested in arcades, but never officially released. Several prototype carts were released into the wild.

name: Onka
description: Explore the mansion and escape in this 3D horror game. Solve the riddles and escape from the ghosts that roam the mansion!

name: Assia: Returning to Dreams
description: Assia:Returning to Dreams "is a 3D jumping parkour game. Is the lonely temple in the snow-white world, strange sculptures that resemble oneself, magnified objects, escaping or returning to a dream? In order to return to her village, Assia embarked on her own journey.

name: Newer Mario Kart Wii
description: A new mario kart wii mod which expands on the original and adds more! Features include 200cc, custom items and MORE! Giving the game a Newer coat of paint!!!

name: All-In-One Summer Sports VR
description: 9 Summer Sports in Just 1 Game! Embark on the ultimate summer adventure. Experience the thrill of various sports on our breathtaking tropical island. More than a game, it's your personal summer paradise, your ticket to a sports-filled, sun-soaked virtual vacation.

name: Undead Wilderness
description: Undead Wilderness: Survive the unforgiving jungle, unravel its mysteries, and escape the relentless horde of bloodthirsty zombies. Scavenge, manage resources, and fight for your life in a heart-pounding race against the growing undead threat.

name: My Talking Cat Lily
description: Your virtual pet is here! Play with talking cat Lily - purrfect virtual cat. What’s furry, playful and waiting to get your attention? It’s your new virtual pet! Start the adventure together with your talking cat Lily. Care for your virtual cat and make her the happiest feline ever! Love your talking pet like you’ve never loved any pet before! Download and play My Talking Cat Lily.

name: Random Merge Defense
description: Simple, Addictive The "Random Merge Defense"

name: Hero Beetle War: Tower Attack
description:
In the world of shadow ninjas, role-playing a skilled ninja fighting against hordes of devil ninjas to save your girlfriend.
Your beloved has been kidnapped, and the only way to get her back is to parkour through a massive tower filled with enemies at every level. But don't worry coz you have some powerful skills up your sleeve. You can use your shadow power and beetle jitsu to brawl against the devil ninjas, even the strongest boss in multiple epic fights.
As you fight through thousands of battles, you will become as strong as a superman. With each level, you will need to choose which enemy to fight first to build up your strength and become the strongest avenger of them all.
But the path to victory is not easy. You will face many challenges on your journey, and only the most skilled and cunning ninjas will succeed. Do you have what it takes to save your girlfriend and become the ultimate avenger? The fate of your love and the world rests in your hands.
So, gear up with your ninja weapons and get ready for an epic adventure in Hero Beetle War.

name: Snackroach
description: Assist your distant cousin, Snackroach, on a perilous mission! Guide the courageous little critter towards the coveted food gate while minimizing your taps. Navigate past foes, hurdles, and treacherous rockfalls!

name: Mechers
description: Checkers with Mech Robots.

name: Bottle Empire
description:
Bottle Empire is a board game where the goal is to create an empire of breweries and casinos. The game takes place in the 1920s during the prohibition era in America.
The mafia organization is your enemy and you have to withstand their attempts to prevent you from becoming the Kingpin of Bottles.

name: Raceway
description: Animal go-carting at its finest! Grab your friends, pick your favourite cute animal racer, and go for gold!

name: PixelTerra
description: The world of PixelTerra is quite dangerous so you need to build a shelter, find some food supply and get ready to protect yourself from monsters in order to survive at least a couple of days. Then you can only hope that the walls of your shelter will be strong enough to withstand the onslaught.

name: Space Lazors: Puzzle Saga
description:
Space Lasers - puzzle with lasers and mirrors. In game there are more than 300 levels that can help you forget about your problems and spend time with pleasure. Use your mind, wit and creative potential to solve difficult puzzles quickly.
The game is divided into several worlds that have from 20 to 30 levels of different complexity and block characteristics (some of them reflect the laser, others reflect and pass it through themselves or teleport to other places etc).

name: Xcalibur 2
description: XCALIBUR 2 is an exciting and fast paced speed runner.

name: RPS Knights
description:
Large-scale wars under the 'Rock-paper-scissors' rules you know.
A unit who lose a game or draw in a game will drop out.
Only winners can stay in a queue and challenge again.
Enjoy unbelievably huge Rock-paper-scissors wars!

name: Tri-Tri-Triobelisk
description:
Tri-Tri-Triobelisk is a fast paced strategy game that is designed for being played by two people on the same iPad (computer opponents are also included). Maneuver shots with your fingers to destroy the other player's five triangular crafts while defending your own. Made for intense duels of frantic firing, tactics, guile and agility.
Contains an original soundtrack by electronic musician Triobelisk.

name: Odyssey Moon
description: Discover Odyssey Moon, the charming ARCADE game filled with shooting, upgrades, and adorable characters. Explore the moon in space, enhance your character with unique combinations, and immerse yourself in this cute adventure. Get ready to fall in love!

name: Valiant
description: Valiant is a first person shooter game.

name: San Xing Dui
description: This is a click , Roguelike game inspired by China's Sanxingdui culture. Players can use the left mouse button to attack and the right mouse button to upgrade to unlock the entire Sanxingdui;

name: Lovely Links
description: This is a classic puzzle game where players clear the game area by eliminating blocks with matching patterns. Within the given time, players need to find connectable blocks to unlock beautiful CG images. Challenge your observation and reflex skills, and enjoy the fun of elimination!

name: Entrenched
description: Entrenched is a Mulitplayer FPS World War 1 inspired arena shooter where you play in many warzones.

name: Project: Shiba
description:
As the world's first half-human hybrid, you know that you're not something that's supposed to exist. Yet, here you are. An outcast in a world that's not your own.
Stuck in a feud between yourself and your encroaching distorted view of the world.
To you, things have always been black and white.
You've accepted your worth on this planet, and have accepted whatever torment the next day may bring.
You've accepted that you belong in captivity, locked away from the world, and have always been nothing more than some science project.
However, one day, in a spur-of-the-moment impulse...
..your entire life will change.

name: Monke Adventure
description: Monke Adventure is a platformer game made by turtledev69, it is set in a jungle where you need to escape

name: Harem
description: An unreleased erotic game for the Atari 2600.

name: Nightsong
description:
In Nightsong you play Linda Nightsong, a level 0 bard, with great fishing skills, and some magical knowledge. When a series of mysterious attacks strikes a riverside village, Linda and her friend Uzoma come to the rescue, and must save all the villagers before dark! To fend off the bewitched creatures, you must use the power of your magic tambourine to put the creatures to sleep and continue your quest.

This is a 30-minutes platform where you need to save all villagers before the time up. With several routes, you must carefully explore Anhuma village, using safe routes, avoiding traps, and avoiding creatures as much as possible, putting them to sleep.

name: Paper.io 4
description: Sin descripción

description: Puzzle game using three types of objects to solve problems

name: Hiirun
description: Witch's cat turned her master into a mouse! Aim for the highscore by chasing the cat, surviving, collecting cheese and jumping on bouncy flowers! Jump over the mouse traps and watch out for the bouncy flowers that turn into ouchy ouchy flowers when hit by magic.

name: Recordance
description: Recordance is a sci-fi themed first person shooter game. Utilize experimental weapon systems and vehicles to defeat an unknow enemy across multiple environments. Unlock new weapon systems and customise your droid and vehicles as you battle towards victory!

name: Trap Attack
description: TRAP ATTACK is a fast-paced arcade game. Use your teleporter to move around the levels and try to avoid the traps. Traps will increase in number and in difficulty over time. Test your reflexes, survive as long as you can. How long can YOU last?

name: Bengbo
description: A crazy roguelike shooter where being on a roll and rolling dice is synonymous. Upgrade yourself and battle mechanical adversities in a corrupt casino set in a future Sweden!

name: Ash of Gods: Universe Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Ash of Gods: Fan Edition
description: The Fan Edition also includes soundtracks and art books for both games, plus bonus digital art and a print and play set of playing cards from Redemption!

name: Lepidoptera
description: A butterfly identification and social adventure game. Identify butterflies in South Dakota and Autralia.

name: The Dark Pictures Anthology: The Craven Man
description: The Craven Man is the fourth installment of the second season of The Dark Pictures Anthology series, and the eighth installment overall

name: The Dark Pictures Anthology: Winterfold
description: Winterfold is the third installment of the second season of The Dark Pictures Anthology series, and the seventh installment overall.

name: The Dark Pictures Anthology: Intercession
description: Intercession is the second installment of the second season of The Dark Pictures Anthology series, and the sixth installment overall.

name: Azumi and the Vertical Slice
description: Azumi and the Vertical Slice is a proof of concept for a 2D action platformer that attempts to bring modern indie speed and catharsis to the classic days of the Sega Mega Drive and Blast Processing. Fight through a wave of enemies and escape the room you're trapped in!

name: Hannah & Henry
description: Presto! Magic becomes real for big hearted latchkey kid Hannah, a witch-in-training under the tutelage of her pet cat, as she learns that genuine witchcraft is not the kind of hocus pocus that she's seen on TV!

name: Where Is Sarah?
description: You shall look for Sarah that faded out of your whole memory. The circumstance and unknown guy who often interrupts you would bother you continuously. Chronic drinking and overtime works had destructed your mind, but you will get back your memories and your wife, Sarah, too.

name: Lab Cat Escape
description: Get ready for an action-packed adventure in "Lab Cat Escape," an exhilarating endless runner game. Guide a clever lab cat through a perilous laboratory, using gravity-switching abilities to dodge obstacles and achieve high scores. Run and switch gravity in this addictive, fast-paced runner!

name: Idle Champions: Little Luigi the Parrot Familiar Pack
description: Familiar packs contain an exclusive familiar, as well as a collection of potions that can help you progress further and faster! Familiars are NPCs that you can assign to certain tasks, such as leveling up Champions, clicking the monsters, or using Ultimates.

name: Hombre
description:
Hombre is a local Multiplayer shoot em' up for 2 or 4 players,
Shoot it Out in the Old West to be Top Hombre

name: F1 23: Champions Upgrade
description: Get* F1 23 Champions Upgrade and be the last to brake in EA SPORTS F1 23, the official videogame of the 2023 FIA Formula One World Championship.

description: A Satire on Solving the Overpopulation Crisis, One Murder at a Time

name: Field Peas: Sayaendou
description:
If you steal beans, they will attack you.
「Sayaendou」

name: Dreamland Discover the Secrets of the Girl
description: This is a game that combines "beautiful girls" and "finding differences" gameplay.

name: Baby Adventure
description: Baby adventure is a nice and funny platformer 2d game.

name: Sackboy: A Big Adventure - Sports Clothing Pack
description: The hottest new label of sporty apparel has launched to great excitement across Craftworld. Add loads of new gear to your wardrobe from skater shirts to faded jeans, trainers, beanies, and much more. Internet connection required to access downloadable content.

name: Project First Contact
description: As of lately, there has been a rising occurrence in strange events and people reporting hallucinations. Unidentified objects are approaching Earth, while mankind in is full alert.

name: Train Simulator 3: Thameslink BR Class 700/0 EMU
description: Modern commuting doesn't get any better than this, experience the state-of-the-art Desiro City and crunch capacity through the Medway Towns with the Thameslink BR Class 700/0, ready for Kentish service in Train Sim World 3!

name: Xenion
description: A first-person game about building factories automated by drones to run a machine that terraforms a tiny planet, with emphasis on the weather aspect. As you terraform, geographic positioning of factories becomes key to avoid different types of destructive weather that can occur.

name: Santa Ski vs. Zombies Ski
description:
Oh my gosh! Rudolph was furious! Christmas gifts fell down the mountain.
That's where the zombies are skiing. Avoid zombies and put them on the sleigh.
Don't relax until the last minute. It can be played very easily, but it is very difficult to reach the final stage!

name: Flick Soccer 22
description:
Play soccer with ultimate control, realistic ball physics and incredible graphics. Fun gameplay across five addicting game modes including nail-biting free kicks, arcade style target practice, and insane soccer skills in the crossbar challenge.
The beautiful game is more dazzling than ever with all new graphics and state-of-the-art special effects, including depth of field and bloom. New design, new players and fields, different times of day, weather conditions including rain and snow, new classic and pro soccer balls, even more uniforms and player animations.

name: Fisher Birds HD
description:
In “Fisher Birds”, you can control your own bird, fly over the sea and dive for fish.
Unlock new birds with the fish you catch and enjoy a new style of fly and fishing.
No Pressure! You can fly in the sky all you want and dive for fish when you feel like it. Just look out for vicious crows!
Compete with your friends to find out who the best fisher or flyer are!
If you are running low on fish, visit our Facebook page or watch our videos to receive complementary fish from us! Also we reward our fans with 50 free daily fish.
Would you care for a flight right now?

name: Football: The Beautiful Game
description: A beautiful game of skill, beauty, and broken dreams. No compelling story, gorgeous hand-drawn artwork or advertisments to get in the way.

name: Chef Town
description:
There’s a new chef in town! And it’s you! But that will be just one of your many roles!
A budding but faltering restaurant business was left in your care, and it will take all you’ve got to really get it off the ground and make it work. Become a cook, a chef, a manager, an organizer, a provider! Yes, it’s up to you to start from scratch, run your own restaurant and raise it from rags to riches! It will be quite an adventure!

name: Tap Drift: Wild Run Car Racing
description: New generation car racing game, involves amazing drifting skills in order to feel the best car racing experience ever. Tap Drift is a realistic 3D simulation drift racing, which involves thrill and amusement along interactive graphics Cs. Choose from four car variants of your choice with variations of speed, grip and drift to maximize your score. If you are a real drifter then Tap Drift is your game!

name: GX Monsters
description: Join thousands of players worldwide in the most epic monster truck racing game ever - GX Monsters! Unlock extreme monster trucks, apply countless customization features and start your journey! Tune your skills in fun single player events or compete with other players in multiplayer.

name: Federation
description: Explore & build your way home in this 3D time-manipulation production puzzler.

name: Exigent
description: Decide between bad and worse options as you try to keep an abandoned spacecraft together long enough for a safe enough landing.

name: Ned: Iron Outlaw
description: Ned is a doom-like 2D metroidvania platformer, based on Ned Kelly – Australia’s most infamous outlaw. Run and gun through endless swarms of enemies, wielding standard shooters alongside some truly original (and crazy) weapons; explore a twisted take on true events starring real life Aussie legends; And decide the fate of the tangled bush, with playing style determining Ned’s choice between folk-legend or corrupted beast.

name: KittyKart
description: Experience the game that will have everyone talking! Introducing KittyKart: web3's funnest, baddest, racing battle royale! KittyKart combines the nostalgia of old go-kart racing games with two emerging genres: the first person shooter and play-to-earn. Not only will players have to race to win, but they will have to fight to survive.

name: Football Master

name: Limbo Disco
description: Sin descripción

name: Lethal Operation: Episode 2 - Destroyer Rei
description: キャラをじっくり育てながら広い世界を冒険する――。 そんなSTGがあってもいいじゃないか!! …というのがこのゲームのコンセプト。 「ルギッタ編」と比べシューティング寄りで、すべて束ねた火力はまさに一撃必殺。 大量の敵を次々に破壊していく爽快感をお楽しみ下さい!

name: Brave Checker
description: Sin descripción

name: Laser Overload: Mirror Puzzle
description: Sin descripción

name: Gloom Reaper
description: Take your scythe and get ready for the hunt in this 2.5D Platform Game; venturing into different regions to fight with Light and Darkness against dangerous creatures that dwell in the shadows. Do you have what it takes to emerge victorious?

name: Droidmals: Lavanlier Town
description: A classic JRPG with a horror setting and collectible creatures. Delve into abandoned buildings, shady woods and secret laboratories to recover all the creatures before it's too late!

name: PCD
description: Only death is real.

name: Sky Roller: Rainbow Skating
description: Sin descripción

name: Katana Master
description: Sin descripción

name: Trishu-Drift
description: Trishu Drift aims to be the next generation of racing games, offering players a variety of exciting features and gameplay modes. The game provides options for both casual and realistic driving experiences to cater to different player preferences. With its selection of high-performance cars, players can engage in thrilling races and challenges on diverse tracks, each presenting its own unique obstacles. The game boasts impressive graphics and a physics engine that adds a sense of realism, allowing players to feel the speed and control of their vehicles. From vibrant city streets to scenic countryside roads, Trishu Drift offers visually stunning environments to explore. With its deep gameplay, including single player races, multiplayer competitions, and special events, players have ample opportunities to earn rewards, unlock new cars and tracks, and continually engage with the game. Overall, Trishu Drift stands out as a must-play title for racing game enthusiasts, combining stunning visuals, engaging gameplay, and thrilling races for an immersive experience like no other.

name: Bug Bite!
description: Bug Bite is an exhilarating game that puts players in the paws of a courageous squirrel on a mission to conquer a bug-infested forest. As the nimble squirrel dashes through lush environments, players must skillfully jump, slide, and use power-ups to defeat swarms of pesky bugs while collecting nuts for extra points. With vibrant visuals, challenging levels, and an infectious soundtrack, Bug Bite offers a captivating adventure for players of all ages. Get ready to embark on an epic squirrelly quest and prove your bug-bashing prowess in this action-packed, critter-crushing extravaganza!

name: Forever Indy
description: A mod for WWF No Mercy about mainly 00s and early 10s american independent wrestling

name: Hentai Lust
description: The game "Hentai Lust" is relaxing a hentai puzzle in which you need to move the elements vertically or horizontally to get the finished image.

name: Blood Samurai
description: After hundreds of years of civil war, the Blood Samurais of the Kanagi clan had secured victory at hand and the unification of the Eastern Empire was only a matter of time.

name: Command & Conquer: Legions
description:
Welcome back, Commander!
The great conquer lies ahead of you. Devise masterful real time strategy to rule the land on a vast map shared by all players. Harvest resources, develop advanced weapon technology for your army and air force, forge powerful alliances, and conquer cities, regions and ultimately claim total world domination.

name: Mugen Sweeper
description: Evolved minesweeper. Infinitely zoomable board. Portal gimmick.

name: Rift Walker
description: A medieval turn-based action game with time traveling elements! Travel with your party across the realms and slay many demons, creatures, and other enemies trying to stop you from defeating the Dark Lord!

name: Bam Boost
description:
Bump other players and try to be the first of this epic run !
You won't want to leave this pixel environment which is full of crazy characters.

name: Mobo Greenhouse Garden
description:
In Mobo Greenhouse game you are a professional gardener but you are not alone. Just seed some magic beans and wait for cute little leprechauns to help you.
If you are really good at growing plants, you will win awards, e.g. for “The most beautiful cucumber in the world”. Take a picture with your price and enjoy it later. Satisfaction is guaranteed.

Mobo Greenhouse is not only about vegetables. We believe that beauty is also a real value - so your kid can grow some flowers. There is a benefit to that. Busy bees will come and produce sweet honey that Mr. Dog, Clever Parrot, Little Kitten and Brave Dinosaur love.

Our goal is to entertain and inspire, allowing children to learn through play. Greenhouse Garden is an app that not only fosters curiosity but demonstrates cause and effect for children and stimulates memory. It also helps to develop eye-hand coordination.
The game is kid-friendly and safe, animals are cute and graphics is adorable.
Mobo Greenhouse Garden is a unique game – there is always something happening there. You have to take a really good care of your seeds, water them and remove the weeds.

name: Children of the World
description: Children of the World is a 2D adventure indie game displayed in a 3D world with puzzles, platforms, music, and minigame elements based on the movie Boy and the World.

name: Touhou Kosuzu no Butsuri Game!
description: This is a very stupid Touhou 2nd creation physics game featuring Kosuzu-chan, who is stuck in a jar!

name: Lipsync Killers
description: Lipsync Killers is a music RPG game for PC and mobile devices. Choose your drag, and do your best to perform on stage. Collect coins and diamonds to upgrade your attributes and get new skins with themed looks. Complete extra quests to get even more chances to acquire upgraded items and characters.

name: Combat Spec Ops
description: Combat Spec Ops is a team-based, tactical TPS (Third Person Shooter) based on close quarters combat and objective-oriented multiplayer gameplay. Bring back retro multiplayer gameplay where skill is rewarded, and teamwork matters!

name: Port of Mars
description:
Port of Mars is an online, game-based, social science experiment set on the first human community on the Red Planet. You are 1 of 5 residents at the Port of Mars, the first long-term habitat on the planet. Each game consists of 8—12 rounds, each with phases of investing, trading, purchasing, discarding, and reacting to Mars events. Chance and player actions impact system health. If system health falls to zero all players die.

Your mission is to stay alive and achieve the most Victory Points. In each round you will usually receive 10 time blocks that you can invest in System Health or Influence resources. System Health keeps your team alive. Influence resources are used to purchase Accomplishments that earn you Victory Points.

name: Tlen Kray
description: A point-and-click game about a little girl. In this first episode you, together with the main heroine, will have to experience her difficult and dark story.

name: Deppart Prototype
description: Deppart is an indie first-person horror game with shooter elements.

name: Wart's Turn-Based Revenge
description: What if Mario 2 was a turn-based strategy game? Well now you don't have to wonder. Give it a shot! Control Mario, Peach, Toad and the Green one. Find advantageous cover and attack the enemies! Stop on a plant to automatically toss it an an enemy for extra damage. Fight through 23 levels with 5 boss fights! Completing all levels takes 2-3 hours. 3 different level completion modes are available: Defeat All, Reach Area, and Defeat Boss. Saving is only supported in the downloadable version.

name: More Sundaes!
description:
Make, decorate, eat and share virtual ice cream sundaes and ice cream cones on your iPhone or iPod Touch!

More Sundaes! is better than a trip to the ice cream parlor. Pick out your dish or cone, load up with as many scoops as you want from a dizzying selection of ice cream, add specialty items like brownies, cookies, or bananas, drizzle on sauces, and then top it off with everything from whipped cream to candy, fruit and nuts.

You can make banana splits, brownie sundaes, hot fudge sundaes, fruit sundaes, waffle cones, double ice cream cones, and more!

After you have built the world’s greatest sundae, dig in! Take virtual bites or even lick the ice cream off a cone just by swiping your finger. But before you eat it all, save a photo of your ice cream to your photos album, share it on Facebook, or email it to your friends.

More Sundaes has all the polish and variety our fans have come to expect from Maverick Software food apps.

name: The Void Rolls Back
description: It's the end of the world again. The void has taken over everything, and is causing entropy in all 6 regions. However, you and your companions know the drill by now. Armed with powerful reality-altering dice, you set out on a journey to restore the lands, and hopefully beat the end of times again. To win, you must reach the edge of the world and defeat the horror which lurks there.

name: Hypercoven
description: RTS with focus on large and fast battles. Units are free, make the most of them

name: Naval Campaigns Spanish-American War
description:
The Spanish-American War of 1898 marked the rise of one Great Power and the fall of another. This conflict, spurred on by colonial ambitions and the infamous destruction of the USS Maine, was decided at sea in two short and brutally decisive engagements at Manila Bay and Santiago de Cuba. With no ability to support their troops abroad, Spain admitted defeat within just five months.

The war took place during a period of unprecedented changes in naval technology and doctrine, with stark differences from one ship to the next. Both sides suffered from a variety of unforeseen challenges, be it from lack of experience or preparedness. In the end, the numerical, qualitative and home-field advantages carried the day for the United States.

But what if events had turned out differently? In addition to the two historical and rather one-sided battles, this game also depicts many hypothetical situations in which commanders made different decisions at key moments or had more resources to work with. Spanish soldiers fought gallantly even with their serious handicaps. When given better tools and tactics, perhaps they could have changed the course of history?

name: Sorry, We Have A Policy
description: A short and unhappy game about trying to get trans healthcare. The goal is to try to get to the front of the line without dying.

name: SecretHitler.io
description:
Play the hit board game in your browser!
Secret Hitler is a dramatic game of political intrigue and betrayal set in 1930's Germany. Players are secretly divided into two teams - liberals and fascists. Known only to each other, the fascists coordinate to sow distrust and install their cold-blooded leader. The liberals must find and stop the Secret Hitler before it is too late.

name: Brain Memory: Platinum Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley - Amazing Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Among Water: Meditation Idle
description: Join the cat fisherman on an exciting sea adventure in this cat game. Dive into the animal ocean and collect valuable treasures while uncovering its secrets. Upgrade your boat and fishing skills to make your quest more enjoyable. Discover whole new world with lighthouses in this thrilling mobile pocket game that cat lovers will adore.

name: Landslide
description:
"Landslide - by Cozy Labs" takes you on an exhilarating adventure as Cozy and friends skateboard down the slopes of an erupting volcano! Strap on your skateboard, gather your courage, and prepare for a thrilling endless skater experience like no other.

Dodge obstacles, navigate treacherous paths, and collect shimmering coins as you descend through the volcanic terrain. Watch out for massive rocks that stand in your way – unleash epic power-ups to clear your path! Execute daring tricks and grind on rails to showcase your skills and boost your score to new heights.

name: Reflow
description:
Reflow is a new way to play with your iDevice and the world! Using the realtime camera image, the game abstracts your environment into a black and white level. Let virtual fluids flow on everything that meets your cameras eye. Use whatever you like - friends, objects, pets, strangers - to solve the given challenges in the most unique way. Play wherever you want - parties, bars, parks, schools, the office - do it alone or collaboratively with friends and colleges. Share your solution pics online via twitter, facebook, email and other services or compete for high-scores with players worldwide using Game Center.
Just give it a shot: Level with your world! Now!

name: Two or More!
description:
Two or More! is a puzzle game in which players connect and remove colored blocks to earn points!
Connect blocks of the same color horizontally or vertically -- or use a combination of both. The more blocks that are connected at once, the higher the score. Earn bonuses for having fewer blocks remaining at the end of each level. Challenge friends to see who can get to the top of the leaderboards.

name: Split the Ball
description:
Split the Ball is puzzle game where player test their reflex through a series of obstacles at high speed. Manipulate the ball through various obstacles in each puzzle level using action like splitting, merging, shrinking, phasing, etc.
Challenge yourself through 80 levels across 4 level pack themes, daily puzzle and endless arcade. Are you fast enough to navigate the ball through each obstacle?

name: Pixel Pro Golf
description: Pixel Pro Golf is a wonderfully unique arcade golf game, that combines realistic physics with zen-like gameplay and beautiful pixel-art. It can be played online, over iMessage, or as a single player experience.

name: Super Golf World
description:
Put your skills to the test in Super Golf World with 18 challenging holes. Master 2D finger physics as you refine your shots to work out the best approach to each hole. Each course offers a new challenge as you swing your driver for the final putt.
Enjoy Super Golf World!

name: Men in Pants
description:
Strap on those pants and get ready to settle any dispute by launching yourself further than your friends (or enemies) without falling to your doom.
Who's buying the next beer? Let Men in Pants decide.
Whose turn is it to make the coffee? Get Men in Pants involved.
Whose goat is this? Men in Pants will solve all of your farmyard debates.
Got an allergy to polyester? No problem, our pants are 100% organic cotton.

name: For Honor: Year 1 - Heroes Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Infinite Ancient: Room Escape
description:
Infinite Ancient Doors Escape is a combination of point and click type classical room escape games of different locations. These escape games are logically developed with tricky puzzles, adventure location, messy clues, and obscured-hidden objects to enter into the clue of Best Escape games. These games will surely test your brain logical and analytical skills. These Free rooms and doors escape games are designed in the sense of real fun, hi-fi scenes, more thrilling twists, challenging and exciting soundtracks to make you addicted and crazy for the escape game lovers.
Can you Escape 150 in 1 Infinite Ancient Doors Escape?

name: Exotic Traffic Racer: FastLane
description:
Exotic Traffic Racer pits your driving skills in an endless highway as you dodge and drive past incoming cars in both the left and right lanes.
We've simplified the controls to only two options. Touch the left of your screen to drive left and touch the right of your screen to drive right.
Challenge and compete with your friends and conquer the leaderboards.
Purchase and collect various cars for sale using in-game money.

name: Raccoon Pizza Rush
description:
Rocky has a business proposition for you! Help him start a New York City food delivery service in this fast paced action game. Food on demand is a big business in the city that never sleeps! You’ll begin by delivering pizza, but new friends will help Rocky expand by bringing their favorite treats like ice cream and sushi. Deliver pizza, grow your business, and take the Big Apple by storm.

Enjoy one tap input in this simple side scrolling runner. Hold down to stop Rocky from getting crushed by traffic. He just wants to keep running, but you’ve got to get him to his destination with both him and the pizza intact.

name: Stickman Ragdoll
description:
Stickman: "Where're my leg? My head? You hit it down again? ..."
This is a casual, skillful game where you manage him, break and destroy the transport and different requisites! Make incredible tricks, crash into the walls, destroy the vehicles and have fun!
You will come across realistic physics in the game, full of mastership and speed. Destruction are close to real life. Prove that you are the best of the best on the planet! Entertain your stickman more and more! Try realistic and full of events crash atmosphere in the game, made in the best traditions of stickman destruction games! Make incredible tricks, and open new levels!

name: Medieval Clicker Blacksmith
description:
Welcome to the first Medieval Clicker adventure, a game where you’ll be able to craft the most epic fantasy weapons ever as a talented blacksmith!
Wield the Legendary Hammer and join Talkor the medieval blacksmith and her daughter Vala in this adventure forging the most rare materials and therefore, crafting amazing medieval weapons.

Click and tap! That will be the only way your blacksmith will be able to forge epic medieval weapons nonstop!

name: Call of Outlaws
description: Explore a truly enormous Wild West frontier full of cowboys, bandits. Realistic great story.

name: Casting Shadows
description: Eris has had a rough life, and to her it feels like she's just living day to day, trying to make things work. She has always had a hard time connecting with others, but soon she will learn to put her trust into an unlikely source and will discover her destiny is hiding in the shadows.

name: A Normal Home in Ohio
description: A fabulous puzzle house escape game where you can experience Horror and Comedy together.

name: I am Rabbit
description: 3D Flatformer Cute Adventure Rabbit Game Traverse captivating landscapes from forests to cities, seas, skies, and even the moon itself ! Enjoy charming low-polygon graphics ! Overcome challenging traps!

name: As I Began to Dream
description: As I Began to Dream is an enchanting puzzle-platformer that merges a unique environment manipulation mechanic. Utilize this power to navigate dream worlds, solve puzzles, and aid Lily's escape from her dream realm.

name: Causal Effect
description: This is a text-based deduction game. Your choices will change the development of events, make up different timelines, and lead to different endings. Your primary task is to sort out the cause-and-effect relationships between events from textual descriptions.

name: Scopaesthesia
description: Join your friends or go it alone in this cooperative horror game. Collect pieces of evidence to uncover a mysterious disappearance, all while an unknown entity lurks in the shadows. Venture through a variety of environments, gathering what you can to progress and complete your objective...

name: Wizard World
description: World of Wizards: Fighting the Morvagore Demon of Hell offers rich graphics, captivating plot and exciting gameplay that provides hours of adventure and entertainment. Will players be able to defeat Morvagora and save the world from destruction? It depends on their skills, courage and determination!

name: T10X Car Simulator
description: Electric car simulation with high quality graphics.

name: Fung
description: Nurture your mesmerizing slime mold and dive into the depths of a radiation-soaked realm, harnessing its energy. Whatever you do, do not stop feeding the Fung!

name: Underworld Adventures
description: Underworld Adventures is an excellent 2D adventure game, with RPG elements, in which you need to destroy an ancient evil and free your country from terrible monsters.

name: Derby
description:
Jump into your virtual park to play baseball from the comfort of your home. Play ball with your friends from across the world! Practice your swing, home runs and trick shots. Spawn infinite pitches in this virtual batting cage and take as many swings as you’d like!

Derby uses custom baseball physics, making VR baseball feel more real than ever before!

name: Alterlight
description: After the land has been plagued by a mysterious presence that has sucked all the color out of it, you must help Ash to unlock his powers and restore the color using the crystalline scepter, use your special character abilities to solve the unique puzzles laid ahead of you and be a hero.

name: Extermination Day
description:
Extermination Day is a ZDoom map pack that uses many zdoom features, and allows the player to freely make use of jumping, crouching and even rocket jumping without worrying about breaking the game flow.
The maps are specially aimed at Zandronum's online cooperative play. All maps will have 8 player start locations so a lot of people can join without causing telefrags at the start, and all maps will have almost twice as much monsters in multiplayer. Some maps will also feature Deathmatch and maybe Invasion versions.

This wad will also feature a hidden ending, that can only be achieved by finishing the game on the Ultra-Violence skill or higher.

name: Super Mario Evolution
description: Super Mario Evolution is a cancelled mod for New Super Mario Bros. U. This mod aimed to make for an interesting and fun experience.

name: More Holiday Dinner!
description:
Mix stuffing, stuff your turkey, bake it and carve it. Peel potatoes, boil them and then mash them right on the screen. Or make some green bean casserole or macaroni & cheese. All your favorite sides, breads, desserts and salads are there, with fun interactive mixing, shaking, and swiping to bake.

After you’ve made the perfect meal, head from the kitchen to the dining room to serve up a plate. Add as much or as little as you want, then share your plate on Facebook or via email, or eat it by taking virtual bites. And you can always go back for seconds!

name: More Salad!
description:
More Salad! gives you all the ingredients you need to make, eat, and share virtual salads.

First, pick your favorite plate, then load up with 50 different salad fixings, from all kinds of greens to veggies, fruit, nuts, and cheeses. Put as much or as little as you want on your plate, then shake your phone to toss it together!

Next, you can pour on 8 dressings, including classics like ranch, italian, french, caesar, thousand island, blue cheese, and oil & vinegar. If you want to coat your salad with dressing, toss it again!

Finally, add toppings like bacon bits, grilled chicken, salmon, or croutons.

When you’re done, you can virtually eat your salad, a bite at a time. Or email a photo (even including an automatically built recipe card!) to a friend.

You’ve made cupcakes, toast, and pizzas on your phone, now it’s time for a salad!

name: More Pizza!
description:
From the creator of the hits More Toast and More Cowbell comes an app that lets you bake & eat virtual pizzas on your iPod Touch or iPhone! Named one of Slate.com’s “Best iPhone apps for kids”.

Turn your iPhone into a pizzeria! Choose your crust, pour on the sauce, add loads of cheese and all the toppings you want. Then bake it right there in your virtual oven, where it will come out piping hot and ready to slice.

Once you’ve made your pizza masterpiece, you can email the whole pie or just a slice to your friends, save a picture to your photos library, or serve it up on a plate and take virtual bites out of it!

You can choose the type of plate and tablecloth to serve your pizza on, to give it the ambiance it deserves.

name: More Toast!
description:
If you download only one toaster app for the iPhone, this should be it!

From the makers of the instant classic More Cowbell, More Toast gives your iPhone or iPod Touch the ability to make virtual toast.

That’s right, hot & golden brown toast popping right out of a toaster on your iPhone screen. With toaster sound effects, adjustable settings from light to dark, one or two slice capacity, and a choice of toast. Even take a photo with your camera or choose a picture from your photo library to burn onto the toast automatically.

After your toast is done, you can apply photo-realistic toppings to it, take a snapshot to share with friends, make a sandwich out of two slices, and even virtually eat it!

Amaze or confuse your friends! Have virtual toast anywhere, any time! Your iPhone does so many things, shouldn’t it make you toast as well?

Available toast types: Bread, English Muffin, Bagel, Waffle, Toaster Pastry, Strudel Pastry, French Toast, Crumpets, cinnamon raisin bread

100 toppings include: Butter, Jam, Peanut Butter, Cinnamon Sugar, Syrup, Cream Cheese, Honey, Nutella, Eggs, Bacon, Cheese, Icing, Whipped Cream, Sprinkles, Strawberries, Blueberries, Bananas, Chocolate Chips, Powedered Sugar, Lemon Curd, Butter Pats, Vegemite, Marmite, Strawberry Syrup, Chocolate Syrup, Avocado, Roast Beef and more!

name: GoldenLand
description: GoldenLand is a PvP strategy card game inspired by the classic GWENT

name: God Of Gods
description:
"God of Gods" is a strategy game created by passionate gamers for gamers, offering a gameplay experience reminiscent of Clash Royale. Customize your deck, evolve your characters, and collect unique skills to build a truly exceptional card collection.

Engage in thrilling PvP battles to climb the ladder and establish yourself as a top player, or test your skills in challenging PvE encounters against increasingly formidable opponents.

name: BlazingAngel Mistletear
description: Become a transforming heroine and use various attacks and sweet combos to defeat enemies and monsters, and save your younger sister in this side-scrolling action game!

name: Bird Watch: Central Park
description: Bird Watch Central Park is an Ornithology Simulator where you traverse New York City's central park in search of various bird species to fill your log. Take in the breathtaking scenery of Central Park and keep your eyes peeled for various bird species as you fully immerse yourself in Bird Watching.

name: Bit Reverse
description: A puzzle game with a robot that switches state of an object.

name: The Human Show
description: The Human Show is a spiritual successor to "The Outsiders" from the first DreadX Collection as a conflicting, collaborative asymmetrical multiplayer horror experience. Work together with other contestants to solve puzzles, avoid traps, and deal with a variety of otherworldly creatures each ‘“episode.” To keep the ratings up, the Game Master must not just torture contestants, but also collaborate with them while utilizing randomized trials and challenges every match. Plenty more are planned throughout Early Access to keep contestants expecting the unexpected.

name: Evanesce
description:
A first person horror game where you play as a steward.

The main gameplay loop is based around a "weeping angels" mechanic where,

if you look away the entities will move closer to you.

Combine this with the ps1 airplane atmosphere , great sound design and an interesting narrative and you've got our game.

name: Mega Snake
description: Get bigger, but not all at once! You can also grow bigger. Aim for your goals, seize your opportunities, because time and failure can become your enemies.

name: Puddies
description: Are you curious to discover what lies beyond our planet? Accompany Bean on his space mission and discover an endless number of adorable creatures called Puddies that will have to be trained. Launch yourself into the unknown or you launch him.

name: Daughter of a Scoundrel
description:
In this free Otome visual novel, you play as Danielle Scarletta (Name Changeable), living a relatively comfortable life until the loss of your parents.

After moving in with your grandfather, your life takes another turn - ending up with a man trying to kill you after just discovering your name.

Now staying in a mansion with six strange and dangerous men, who will you trust to be your bodyguard? Will you uncover the real reason behind your parents’ death, make new friends, and potentially a lover along the way? Or will poking your nose in places it doesn’t belong just make you end up like the rest…?

name: Hexaduel
description: Test your number skills in this magical turn-based fighter! Cast hexes in the form of hexadecimal numbers, and block those of your opponent by converting them into decimal notation. Spar alone or with a friend, or brave the gauntlet for the ultimate hexadueling challenge.

name: Tomba! 3
description: The third installment in the series was briefly in development and was never officially announced. In an interview with series creator Tokuro Fujiwara, it was confirmed that an early alpha version was released amongst the game's developers, but any work on the game including the alpha discs were trashed with Whoopee Camp closure in 2000.

name: Surging Seas: Power Saga
description: Join the story of an epic pirate world in fantasy islands. The world of anime is at your fingertips! Gather your crew and make a battle plan.

name: Lunarpunk
description: Lunarpunk is the first Tower Attack ever made. A brand-new experience based on moving forward with your turrets to destroy the cosmic menace. Crush your enemies, develop new turrets, enhance those you have and try to overcome the crisis that desolates your world. Are you ready to push forward?

name: Chicken Scratch
description: Chicken Scratch is a quirky multiplayer drawing game set in a bird office, where you pass on a telephone chain featuring unusual prompts, muddling doodles and wacky captions.

name: Super Tank Attack
description: A super addictive arcade tank shooter from Tudou Games. Protect the enesphere, destroy the enemy.

name: Arcane Pets: Plushie Empire
description:
Arcane Pets introduces the sequel mini-game, Plushie Empire.
Become an overnight entrepreneur and build your empire into a business tycoon. Rake in the Empire Coins and Empire Cash. Compete against a plethora of online players to become the richest Empire out there. Swim in the Empire Cash and get empire-rich.
As a semi-idle game, your Empire will continuously sell the Plushies that you produce & ship.

name: Fatty Fight
description: Embark on a thrilling PvP adventure in Fatty Fight! Dive into the captivating world of strategic matching and intense battles where your skills will be put to the test. Match blocks, charge up your heroes, and lead your team to victory against formidable opponents. Are you ready for the ultimate battle?

name: Music Puzzle
description:
You've never played a game like this one. Music Puzzle is a unique gaming experience, where you arrange songs from famous artists around the world. Each puzzle reflects a part of a song and contains various tracks representing different instruments.

Guitars, drums, voices or more exotic instruments like congas and the tambourine, it is your turn to listen to them carefully and sort them in the right order.
You can always listen to the original and compare it with your current progress. Use your ears and improve your hearing abilities to master the game. Different game modes and challenges will provide hours of gameplay with your favorite songs. Are you able to solve a puzzle with only a limited number of moves? Can you achieve the blind modes?

name: Tempo Nuts
description:
Tap to shoot nuts into screws at the right time. Watch out! If you miss one time, you will fail the level!
How many nuts can you product?

name: Slashy Chords: Guitar Warriors
description: Protect the world of harmony from the monstrous hordes of dissonance with the power of music! Play a real guitar or strum a screen guitar to defeat the forces of discord!

name: PxBeats
description: A perfect mix of RPG and music games.

name: Neogen BeatZ
description:
Neogen Beatz is a crazy synergy of Music and a Ground Breaking Arcade Game!
Neogen Beatz is an arcade with neon lights, fluid gameplay and high speeds and all interacting as one with the mesmeric visual style and accompanying music.
Choose Your Favorite track from Your device and Feel how the Music pulses through the astonishing unique neon backgrounds, while you are playing the game.
Match the neon figures as they fallout, with the cells in the bottom, test your reaction and beat the highscores to unlock new modes.

name: Queued
description: Queued is an endless game with challenges, modes and nice music. You need to tap on the correct color button to match the first shape lined up in the queue. However, the time bar is running down, but the good news is tabbed correct will add back some points to it, and keep concentration while playing to avoid the wrong tabbed. How many shapes you can dequeue?

name: Tall Ships: Age of Sail
description:
Tall Ships: Age of Sail is an action-packed game simulating naval combat in the age of sail. The player commands his ship and fights in a series of campaign battles set in the Mediterranean Sea during 1805. As the campaign progresses, the player will take command of larger and more capable ships while fighting an even more capable enemy.
Tall Ships is an immersive 3D game which utilizes the accelerometer to control movement and standard iPhone gestures to change the view of the battle.

name: Tap Boutique
description:
Express your sassy style sense with Tap Boutique!
Own a fashion boutique and customize it with style! Dress up your avatar and create unique looks with the latest and trendiest fashion.
Works great with iPhone 6S and 6S Plus!

name: Sandbox Planet
description:
Simulate real solar system
Emulate universe develop, build any planet you want.
Highly customizable, bulid your own solar system.

name: DeliCat
description:
Take to the skies and join the ultimate food delivery team!
As a daring cat, quirky chameleon or loyal dog, fly your drone to deliver mouth-watering meals to hungry customers!
Earn cash for each successful delivery and use it to unlock new animals and gear: powerful drones, cool glasses, stylish hats and more!
Featuring intuitive controls and addictive gameplay, DeliCat will keep you hooked for hours! Complete tricky levels in Career mode or beat your friend's high score in the endless High-flyer mode!
But that's not all - DeliCat also features a variety of challenges that you can complete to unlock additional rewards! With each new challenge, you'll become a more skilled pilot, able to navigate the alley with ease and deliver meals faster than ever before!
So, are you ready to take on the ultimate food delivery challenge in this action-packed arcade game? Join the DeliCat crew and take your place among the elite team of animal drone pilots!

name: Flying Unicorn
description:
Flying Unicorn is a side-scrolling mobile game featuring "retro" 2D graphics.
This game is extremely easy to fly, just tap the screen to flap the unicorns wings. While it's easy to fly, it is not easy to play. Don't fly into castle towers.
The unicorn briefly flaps upward each time the player taps the screen, and the player is scored on the number of towers sets the unicorn successfully passes through.

name: CatHotel
description:
Manage your very own cattery:
Mrs. Miller has to go on an urgent business trip and the Smith family are looking for accommodation for their house cat while they're on vacation.
Your cattery is the purrfect place for them! Care for the kitties, feed them and play with them until their owners come to pick them up again.

name: Nova Dash
description: Nova Dash is a crazy action puzzle platformer, which throws you into space with the fun loving Gopas, cute little characters from the outer galaxy. Your goal is to rescue them from the exploding sun, avoiding all sorts of obstacles, from forcefields and aliens to frozen planets, meteor attacks, exploding planets and more!

name: JEFN
description: Catch all the flies before your friends, be the winner and draw a unique picture for them in this funny party game for 2-4 player.

name: BubbleTT: Oh! My Fart
description:
How long can you farting? Challenge yourself now, laugh out loudly and cheer up your day! You can even challenge your friends and family! Share the Nomination Screenshot Today!
Test your swiftness of sight and hearing to become next fart master! You got some warm gas inside the body and needed to let it out silently. Fart is funny, let’s farting for fun!

name: Anatine
description: Anatine is a pixelated metroidvania game that contains organic musical elements. Play the flute to interact with the environment or unleash powerful magic! In the dangerous world of Avenis, battle against the Eidolons and confront powerful enemies to uncover the many secrets of this lost world.

name: Shameless Clone 2
description: An extended version of Shameless Clone, with more characters and worlds.

name: Shameless Clone
description: A retro Flash shooter game in space.

name: Gunnery Cell
description: This is a Rogue bullet shooting game, you will play a resurrected cell in the arena, use the unique weapons you get, use the purest violence to kill the enemies in the arena and survive, collect energy to make yourself stronger, until finally incarnate as a god!

name: Babe Balloon Blast
description: Players need to fire bullets from the turret below the screen to hit the balloon in the screen. Eliminate all balloons. In the middle of the screen, there will be fish swimming to resist bullets. If a player's bullet comes into contact with a fish, their health will decrease.

name: School of Gods
description: All new gods must be trained and educated before they can be left to guide a new-born civilisation on one of the millions of inhabited planets in the galaxy. Journey to the world that has been developed to train new recruits in the intricacies and mysteries of successful civilisation development.

name: Project F
description: "Project F" is a tactical FPS game that features 5-on-5 team battles over defensive targets on a auto-generated map. All maps are generated for each match and never to be encountered again.

name: Thousand Week Reich
description:
The year is 1952 - while the spectre of Nazi domination stands over a nightmarish Europe, the western powers led by the rising United States and the battered but not beaten United Kingdom rise to challenge the wavering German superpower. Since its victory at Dunkirk and the long and costly war against the Soviet Union, Germany’s cruel and nightmarish rule over Europe seems outwardly secure, but as Hitler grows old and ill, instability and rebellion threaten to shake this ‘New Order’ apart. At the same time, the ripples caused by the fall of Europe roll across the globe changing the course of history, with European colonial empires falling and a rising Chinese Republic eager to fill the vacuum left by a defeated Japan. though the memory of war lies fresh in the memories of everyone, the perverse status quo cannot hold for long…

Thousand Week Reich is an alternate history mod that attempts to bring a sense of grounded, gritty realism to the age-old trope of an Axis 'victory' in the Second World War. Originally based on a series of maps by AP246/Proximexo, the TWR mod aims to explore a more grounded and ‘realistic’ version of the trope of a victorious Nazi Germany. Enter the world of TWR in 1952 and fight to hold onto the disintegrating remains of German ‘New Order’ or rise up to the task of defeating the oppressor and liberating Europe from Nazi tyranny.

name: Cold War: The Iron Curtain
description:
Welcome to a new era of struggle, determination and conflict, as nations struggle to achieve independence and power. Superpowers rise from the ashes of old, with ideologies that shall determine the fate of the human race permanently. As the superpowers jockey militarily and economically for supremacy, many nations are freed from the yokes of colonial oppression, and finally the people of entire continents, have a say in determining their destiny.

War brews in East Asia yet again, and the African continent will no longer bear the immoral oppression of their people. Eastern Europe is encompassed by the Soviet sphere, and the West seeks to salvage its crumbling throne.

Will you spread your ideas across the globe peacefully, or will you tighten your bootstraps?

name: Millennium Dawn: A Modern Day Mod
description: With the dawn of a new millennium, a new chapter in human history is about to be written. Globalization continues to change the lives of countless billions, while rising extremism is showing signs of igniting the fires of conflict. New powers begin to emerge, and not all believe their place in the global order, or that of some competitors, is warranted. A struggle will soon begin, and it will likely change everything. Will you lead your Nation to prosperity and dominance in the decades ahead, or will your Nation fall victim to the defining moments of history?

name: Drylands
description: In a ravaged world, where the "juice" is the only nutrient and most valuable resource, a prisoner teams up with the people of Serenity and so begins an adventure that will change the wastelands' fate...

name: Hipster Chess
description: Hipster Chess is a smart and addictive time killer, similar to many other match-3 games, but with a clever twist. There's no other player, no checkmate. Line up 4 or more chess pieces to clear them off the board. Sounds simple? The trick is that pieces only move like they do in real chess!

name: Pixel Survival Game 3
description:
How will you craft your house on the deserted island?
Will you survive alone? Or with a bunch of friends together?
How many different plants will you grow?
Do you want to ride a horse and race with friends?
How about raising some farm animals and monsters, and bring them for treasure finding?
...or do you just want to slay monsters.. and your friends?

name: Real Car Parking 3D
description:
Whether you live in a small town or a metro city, being able to drive safely should be a priority. The complicated part of driving is parking of course. With the rising number of cars and the lack of parking space makes, the situation even worse. This is the reason why bumps and scrapes are quite common when parking your car which really turns you off. Next time when you park somewhere, keep the following tips in mind to maintain your car properly. Follow the below parking tips in our new free 3d parking game.
1.For parking, First and the foremost thing you need to do is to reduce the speed to minimum when you have found the place. Then, decide whether you want to go reverse or nose first. Go slowly as this greatly decreases your chance for mistake. In addition, it will get you time to think all your movements and correct your mistakes on the go you can learn this in our 3D parking simulation
2.While parking your car, leave enough space between your car and adjacent cars. This will help the fellow drivers to move their car out of park easily and without striking yours.
3.In packed parking lots, drivers get competitive for parking space. This can be very risky. Keeping your vehicle in control is important at all times. Don’t show an offensive behaviour while parking your vehicle. This can annoy other car drivers sharing the same parking region.
4.Don’t ignore things that make the job of parking easier. If you’re moving backwards, turn around and look behind you; if you’re moving forward, look straight ahead of you. Also ensure that your fellow drivers are aware of your presence. Keep I mind that sometimes your fellow drivers will overlook you so keep aware anytime!

name: Sweets Mania: Candy Sugar Rush Match 3 Games
description: Craving something sweet? Get your daily dose of sweets with a new delicious game for candy lovers! Try out a totally new match 3 game adventure featuring juicy candy elements to combine and eliminate, exciting boosters and missions, amazing blast effects and incredibly tasty graphics!

name: Tap City Tycoon
description:
Make money and build the city as much as possible. Prove you’re the rich man!
You have a great chance to control the cities and countries. You just need to start by tapping the screen as much as you can. Tap your way into riches and money by upgrading buildings and investing in your city. The more cash you invest in businesses the more money they produce for you.
Hire valuable Managers to unlock special business bonuses, and use Ondelz resources for even more cash bonuses!
